title: BRETT price prediction 2025-2031: IS BRETT a good investment?
body: Key Takeaway: BRETT‚Äôs 2025 projection suggests a peak value of $0.43. By 2028, BRETT prediction indicates a maximum price of $0.89. By 2031, BRETT is expected to trade between $1.31 and $1.46. BRETT, or Based Brett, is a meme cryptocurrency launched in February 2024 on the Base blockchain, an Ethereum Layer 2 solution. Inspired by the character Brett from Matt Furie‚Äôs ‚ÄúBoys‚Äô Club‚Äù comic series, BRETT aims to engage users through humor and community interaction. It has quickly gained popularity, boasting a market cap exceeding $1 billion and a total supply of 10 billion tokens, with a fixed supply ensuring scarcity. BRETT operates on a renounced contract, meaning the creator cannot alter its supply or functionalities, which fosters a decentralized governance model driven by community engagement. The token does not impose transaction fees, making it attractive for trading and long-term holding. Its cultural significance and partnerships in decentralized finance enhance its utility and value in the crypto space. title: Trump Family to Launch New Bitcoin Mining Venture with Hut 8
body: Key Takeaways: The venture experiments with a split model that isolates mining as a standalone unit. A high-profile backing blends public recognition with technical oversight. The strategy offers a fresh framework for evaluating crypto asset performance. On Monday, Hut 8 Corp. announced the launch of American Bitcoin Corp., an industrial-scale Bitcoin mining venture created in partnership with Eric Trump and Donald Trump Jr. in the United States. We are proud to partner with @EricTrump and American Data Centers to launch @AmericanBTC . American Bitcoin, a majority-owned subsidiary of Hut 8, aims to become the world's largest, most efficient pure-play miner while building a robust strategic Bitcoin reserve. Join us for a‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/f5ddCxQkqp ‚Äî Hut 8 (@Hut8Corp) March 31, 2025 In a press release , Hut8 said this initiative looks to establish itself as the largest and most efficient pure-play Bitcoin miner while also building a strategic Bitcoin reserve. The initiative follows Hut 8‚Äôs contribution of most of its ASIC miners to American Data Centers, Inc., which has since been renamed American Bitcoin. The transition reflects Hut 8‚Äôs broader restructuring to streamline its Bitcoin mining operations. American Bitcoin Mining to Absorb Hut 8 Operations Under the new agreement, American Bitcoin will assume all Bitcoin mining activities previously handled under Hut 8‚Äôs Compute segment. Hut 8, however, will remain central to operations by serving as the exclusive infrastructure and operations partner. This partnership is expected to support long-term revenue growth for Hut 8‚Äôs Power and Digital Infrastructure segments. ‚ÄúBy combining Hut 8‚Äôs proven operational excellence in data centers with our shared passion for Bitcoin and decentralized finance, we are poised to strengthen our foundation and drive significant future growth,‚Äù said Eric Trump, co-founder of American Bitcoin. Donald Trump Jr. added that while holding Bitcoin has value, mining it under favorable conditions offers a stronger growth opportunity. Hut 8 CEO Asher Genoot noted that creating American Bitcoin as a standalone entity allows the mining division to scale independently and attract investment. Meanwhile, Hut 8 can concentrate on its infrastructure services, creating a more predictable and financeable structure for both companies. Leadership and Operational Support The leadership team at American Bitcoin will include Mike Ho as Executive Chairman, Matt Prusak as CEO, and Eric Trump as Chief Strategy Officer. The Board of Directors will initially feature Mike Ho, Asher Genoot, Justin Mateen, and Michael Broukhim. As part of the agreement, Hut 8 will provide ASIC colocation and managed services to American Bitcoin, ensuring a smooth transition and continued operational excellence. ‚ÄúWhen the Trump family starts mining Bitcoin, you know the game has changed. This is rocket fuel for the entire industry and a huge signal to investors that now is the time to back real Bitcoin infrastructure,‚Äù Mati Greenspan, CFO of Quantum Expeditions, told Cryptonews . The post Trump Family to Launch New Bitcoin Mining Venture with Hut 8 appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Unveiling Coinbase‚Äôs Relentless Pursuit: Restarting FDIC Transparency Lawsuit
body: The crypto world is once again buzzing with legal drama as Coinbase, a leading cryptocurrency exchange, is doubling down on its quest for transparency. Frustrated with what it perceives as stonewalling, Coinbase has reactivated its Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) lawsuit against the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC). Let‚Äôs dive into why this legal battle is crucial for Coinbase, the crypto industry, and what it means for the future of crypto regulation . Why is Coinbase Reviving the FOIA Lawsuit? Coinbase initially filed this lawsuit to gain access to documents from the FDIC, believing these documents hold critical information relevant to the exchange‚Äôs operations and the broader regulatory landscape. The lawsuit was temporarily paused earlier this year when Travis Hill was appointed as Acting FDIC Chair, sparking hopes of a more cooperative approach. However, despite some initial improvements in communication, Coinbase feels that the FDIC is still not providing the level of FDIC Transparency required. According to a post by Eleanor Terrett, a former Fox Business reporter, on X (formerly Twitter), Coinbase alleges that key documents are still being withheld, hindering their ability to fully understand the FDIC‚Äôs stance and actions. The Core Issue: Information Access and Regulatory Clarity At the heart of this legal tussle is the fundamental principle of information access . Coinbase, like any regulated entity, needs clarity and access to information from regulatory bodies like the FDIC to operate effectively and compliantly. Here‚Äôs why this is so vital: Compliance and Risk Management: Understanding the FDIC‚Äôs internal communications and policies is crucial for Coinbase to ensure it is meeting all regulatory requirements and managing risks appropriately. Opaque regulatory processes make compliance a guessing game. Industry Precedent: This case sets a precedent for how regulatory bodies interact with the cryptocurrency industry. If Coinbase succeeds in compelling the FDIC to be more transparent, it could pave the way for greater openness across the board, benefiting the entire crypto sector. Investor Confidence: Transparency from regulators builds investor confidence. Knowing that regulatory processes are open and accountable can encourage more institutional and retail investors to participate in the crypto market. Paul Grewal‚Äôs Stance: Insufficient Transparency Remains Coinbase Chief Legal Officer Paul Grewal has been vocal about the need for greater transparency. While acknowledging some improved cooperation under the new FDIC leadership, Grewal stated that transparency remains ‚Äúinsufficient.‚Äù This suggests that while the FDIC may have made some efforts to engage with Coinbase, they haven‚Äôt gone far enough to satisfy the exchange‚Äôs concerns regarding access to vital information access . This isn‚Äôt just about Coinbase; it‚Äôs about the broader relationship between the cryptocurrency industry and financial regulators. The demand for transparency highlights a crucial tension point: how can innovative, rapidly evolving sectors like crypto navigate regulatory landscapes that are often perceived as opaque and slow-moving? What are the Potential Outcomes and Implications? The court‚Äôs decision on Coinbase‚Äôs motion to resume the FOIA lawsuit will have significant ramifications: Outcome Implications Court grants Coinbase‚Äôs motion FDIC will be compelled to respond to the lawsuit, potentially leading to the release of requested documents. This would be a win for Coinbase and potentially for transparency in crypto regulation . Court denies Coinbase‚Äôs motion Coinbase‚Äôs efforts to gain information through legal means will be thwarted, at least in the short term. This could signal continued challenges for crypto firms seeking regulatory clarity via FOIA requests. The Role of the Financial Watchdog: FDIC Under Scrutiny The FDIC, as a key financial watchdog , plays a crucial role in maintaining stability and public confidence in the nation‚Äôs financial system. Its actions, or lack thereof, are closely watched by the financial industry, including the burgeoning crypto sector. This lawsuit puts the spotlight on the FDIC‚Äôs approach to transparency and its engagement with innovative financial technologies. Is the FDIC being overly cautious, or is Coinbase asking for too much? The answer likely lies somewhere in between. Regulators must balance the need for confidentiality and operational integrity with the legitimate demands of regulated entities for clarity and FDIC Transparency . Actionable Insights for the Crypto Community What can the crypto community learn from this ongoing legal battle? Transparency is Non-Negotiable: Coinbase‚Äôs persistence underscores the importance of demanding transparency from regulatory bodies. It‚Äôs not just about individual company interests but about building a mature and trustworthy crypto ecosystem. Legal Avenues are Important: While dialogue and cooperation are ideal, legal avenues like FOIA can be vital tools to ensure accountability and access to information when necessary. Stay Informed and Engaged: Keep abreast of regulatory developments and engage in constructive dialogue with policymakers and regulators to shape a more transparent and supportive regulatory environment for crypto innovation. Conclusion: The Fight for Transparency Continues Coinbase‚Äôs decision to restart its FOIA lawsuit against the FDIC is a clear signal that the fight for regulatory transparency in the crypto space is far from over. This case is not just about documents and legal procedures; it‚Äôs about fostering a more open, accountable, and ultimately, healthier relationship between the cryptocurrency industry and its regulators. As the FDIC prepares its response, the crypto world watches closely, hoping this renewed legal push will finally unlock the doors to greater information access and clarity. To learn more about the latest crypto regulation trends, explore our article on key developments shaping crypto regulation institutional adoption .

title: Revolutionary iOS 18.4 Unlocks Apple Intelligence & Priority Notifications in EU
body: Exciting news for Apple users! If you‚Äôre deeply invested in the crypto world, you understand the importance of timely information. Imagine getting only the most crucial alerts without sifting through endless notifications. That‚Äôs precisely what Apple is delivering with its latest update. Apple Intelligence, the tech giant‚Äôs powerful suite of AI tools, is expanding its reach and introducing a game-changing feature: Priority Notifications. This update, rolling out with iOS 18.4, iPadOS 18.4, and macOS Sequoia 15.4, not only brings AI to more users in the EU but also refines how you manage your digital life. Let‚Äôs dive into what these updates mean for you and how they are set to redefine your Apple experience. What are Apple‚Äôs Revolutionary Priority Notifications? Tired of notification overload? We all are! In today‚Äôs fast-paced digital world, our devices are constantly buzzing with alerts, many of which are simply noise. Apple‚Äôs new Priority Notifications feature, powered by Apple Intelligence, is designed to cut through the clutter. It intelligently analyzes your notifications and highlights those deemed most urgent and time-sensitive. Think of it as your personal AI assistant for notifications, ensuring you never miss what truly matters. Here‚Äôs what makes Priority Notifications a potential game-changer: AI-Driven Filtering: Apple Intelligence algorithms learn your notification patterns to identify critical alerts. Enhanced Visibility: Important notifications are prominently displayed at the top of your notification stack in a new, distinct format, making them instantly noticeable. Reduced Digital Clutter: By prioritizing essential notifications, you can focus on what needs your immediate attention, minimizing distractions from less important updates. Improved Efficiency: Spend less time sifting through notifications and more time responding to what truly matters, whether it‚Äôs a critical crypto market alert or an urgent personal message. This feature is particularly beneficial for users who rely on their Apple devices for time-sensitive information and want to streamline their notification experience. For crypto enthusiasts, this could mean getting instant alerts about significant market movements or important wallet updates, right when they matter most. Expanding Horizons: Apple Intelligence Arrives in the EU with iOS 18.4 The wait is over for Apple users in the European Union! Apple Intelligence , initially unveiled at last year‚Äôs Worldwide Developers Conference, is now making its way to iPhones and iPads across the EU with the iOS 18.4 update. This expansion is a significant step, bringing a suite of AI-powered features to a wider audience. Previously, Apple cited EU tech regulations, such as the Digital Markets Act, as a reason for the delayed rollout, originally slated for April 2025. However, Apple has managed to overcome these hurdles, delivering AI Features to EU users much sooner than anticipated. This move underscores Apple‚Äôs commitment to making its advanced AI capabilities globally accessible, despite regulatory complexities. EU users can now experience features like: Writing Tools: AI-powered assistance for writing and refining text across various apps. Image Playground: An app for generating fun and creative images using AI. Genmoji: Create personalized emojis using generative AI. Furthermore, Apple Intelligence is also extending its reach to Vision Pro users in U.S. English, bringing these powerful AI tools to Apple‚Äôs mixed reality platform. This means Vision Pro users can now leverage Writing Tools, Image Playground, Genmoji, and more within their immersive experiences. Beyond Notifications: Other Exciting AI Features in iOS 18.4 The iOS 18.4 update is more than just Priority Notifications and EU expansion; it‚Äôs packed with other exciting AI Features designed to enhance your Apple experience. Let‚Äôs explore some of the notable additions: Memory Movies on Mac: Now you can create personalized ‚Äúmemory movies‚Äù on your Mac simply by typing a description. Apple Intelligence will automatically curate photos and videos based on your text input, generating a shareable movie. Sketch Style in Image Playground: Apple‚Äôs AI image generation app, Image Playground, gets a new ‚ÄúSketch‚Äù style. This allows you to create academic and detailed sketches, adding a new artistic dimension to your AI-generated images. Language Expansion: Apple Intelligence is now available in more languages, including French, German, Italian, Portuguese (Brazil), Spanish, Japanese, Korean, and Chinese (Simplified). Localized English support has also been added for Singapore and India, making AI features more accessible to a global audience. Apple News+ Food: The recently announced recipe companion, Apple News+ Food, is also launching with this update, providing a new culinary resource within Apple News+. Revamped Apple Photos App: Expect further tweaks and improvements to the Apple Photos app, enhancing your photo management and editing experience. These updates demonstrate Apple‚Äôs ongoing commitment to refining and expanding its AI ecosystem, delivering tangible benefits to users across various aspects of their digital lives. Why is Apple Intelligence Rollout Gradual? You might be wondering why Apple is rolling out Apple Intelligence features in phases rather than all at once. The truth is, developing and deploying sophisticated AI features at scale is a complex undertaking. Apple‚Äôs approach reflects a commitment to quality and a measured introduction of new technologies. Here‚Äôs a breakdown of the likely reasons for this gradual rollout: Reason Explanation Technological Complexity Generative AI and related features are cutting-edge technologies. Ensuring stability, accuracy, and user-friendliness requires rigorous testing and phased deployment. Infrastructure Scaling Supporting AI features for millions of users globally demands significant infrastructure. Gradual rollout allows Apple to scale its server capacity and optimize performance without overwhelming its systems. Feature Refinement By releasing features incrementally, Apple can gather user feedback and iterate on its AI models and functionalities. This iterative process helps improve the quality and relevance of AI features over time. Regulatory Compliance Navigating global regulations, especially in regions like the EU with stringent data privacy laws, requires careful planning and phased implementation to ensure compliance and address any legal concerns. Apple‚Äôs deliberate approach ensures a smoother user experience and allows for continuous improvement of its AI offerings. While some users might prefer immediate access to all features, this phased rollout ultimately leads to a more robust and refined AI ecosystem. Embrace the Future of AI with iOS 18.4 The latest iOS 18.4 update marks a significant step forward in Apple‚Äôs AI journey. With the introduction of Priority Notifications and the expansion of Apple Intelligence to the EU, Apple is empowering users with smarter, more intuitive, and more efficient digital experiences. These updates are not just about adding features; they are about fundamentally changing how we interact with our devices, making technology work more seamlessly for us. As Apple continues to refine and expand its AI capabilities, we can expect even more groundbreaking innovations in the future. For now, users can look forward to a smarter, more streamlined, and more personalized Apple experience with iOS 18.4 and beyond. To learn more about the latest AI market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping AI features.

title: China‚Äôs fragmented tech rally woes deepens as new home sales decline piles on struggling economy
body: China‚Äôs economic woes look to have intensified as new home sales decline, adding a new strain on an already struggling economy. Notably, the struggles have spared tech stocks, which continue to surge despite macro factors. According to Reuters , data provided by the Chinese National Bureau of Statistics show that property prices, investments, and sales have resumed their downward trend following a brief period of stability. China‚Äôs government has actively intervened in the property market Property prices in China have been on a steady decline since 2021 after a government crackdown on developers caused a liquidity crisis, abandoned projects and wary buyers. Not much has changed since then, despite recent government intervention. The government has been active in trying to stabilize the property market, including it in its 2025 agenda. The government efforts seem to have paid off for about two months as the prices were relatively steady. However, recent data from the Chinese Real Estate Information Corp shows that the market has lost these small gains as new home sales have dipped. While the government is working to normalize house prices, there‚Äôs also the issue of price controls that are usually imposed by local governments. These dips are not only attributed to government actions, as demographic shifts, low demands causing a glut of unsold homes, and low disposable income due to stagnant incomes come into play. While analysts believe that government efforts will cause a positive change in the trends, other factors threaten that change from happening soon. U.S. tariffs add pressure To add to its economic woes, the U.S. introduced a 25% levy on Chinese auto imports, among other tariffs, piling more pressure on China. China has also retaliated by imposing its own tariffs on goods from the United States, further straining bilateral trade relations between the two nations. The Trump administration is expected to roll out its own retaliatory tariffs on April 2, adding more pressure to the Chinese economy. These have raised concerns about the impact of the tariffs on Chinese consumer behavior and its manufacturing sector. China‚Äôs tech surge fails to revive broader markets On the flip side, Chinese tech stocks have been on a trend Deepseek started earlier in the year. Despite the ongoing success of these Chinese tech stocks, it has had little or no growing effect on emerging markets. This is a divergence from the normal trend where the growth in Chinese stocks has a growing effect on the stocks of other emerging markets, which have remained relatively stagnant. The current rallying effect of the Chinese stock market isn‚Äôt felt in the entire Chinese market and its impact hasn‚Äôt really improved the economy, with analysts attributing its rise to the current frenzy surrounding tech, especially artificial intelligence. According to analysts from UBS Group AG in London, the current tech boom isn‚Äôt the same as the typical Chinese boom that occurred in 2009, 2016, and 2020 and impacted emerging markets. It‚Äôs reported that since August 2024, the MSCI China Index has risen by over 30%, while the same cannot be said for emerging markets, which have fallen by 7% since then. Historically, strong growth in Chinese stocks has had a growth effect on other emerging markets. A historical example will be between 2009 and 2010, where a 63% rise in Chinese shares saw a 100% rise in emerging market shares. A similar trend is seen between 2016 and 2017, where Chinese stocks rose by 50% and the emerging markets broad gauge rose by 46%. Prior to the tech-induced boost caused by the launch of the AI model Deepseek, Chinese stocks last saw a slight surge in September 2024, thanks to the Chinese government‚Äôs overall economic stimulus. According to investment analysts, China‚Äôs new trend of outperforming its emerging markets may last longer than expected or desired. They also expressed concerns over the effects U.S. tariffs have on the Chinese stock market. Uncertain outlook for China‚Äôs economy While there are concerns about the impact of these tariffs on consumer behavior in various sectors, such as housing, investors outside of China are also taking a hint, and it could potentially affect the growth of the Chinese stock market negatively and mean more losses for emerging markets. Insights shared by Rohit Chopra, a portfolio manager at Lazard Asset Management, point out that some funds are expressing little confidence in Chinese stocks making a quick comeback and are already doing away with their Chinese holdings. While local experts point out that the Chinese market will experience some form of growth aided by government intervention, they also indicate that the growth curve won‚Äôt be steep. How these predictions play out is left to be seen as the available data looks bleak currently, given the U.S. tariffs and more impending tariffs. Cryptopolitan Academy: Tired of market swings? title: Shocking Delay: Key Alexa Plus Features Missing at Launch
body: Is your smart home feeling a bit‚Ä¶less smart than promised? If you were eagerly anticipating the full potential of Alexa+, Amazon‚Äôs premium AI assistant, you might need to temper your excitement. While Amazon has launched Alexa+, reports are surfacing that many of the hyped, game-changing Alexa Plus Features are nowhere to be found, at least not yet. Let‚Äôs dive into what‚Äôs going on with this much-anticipated upgrade and why the rollout is hitting some unexpected snags. What‚Äôs the Buzz About Alexa Plus Features? Amazon promised a revolutionary upgrade with Alexa+, showcasing impressive capabilities at a recent press event. We were teased with glimpses of an AI assistant that could truly understand and anticipate our needs, performing what are termed ‚Äúagentic AI tasks.‚Äù Think seamless interactions like: Ordering your favorite takeout from Grubhub with just a voice command. Generating imaginative stories to keep kids entertained for hours. Recognizing household members and prompting them about their chores. Brainstorming the perfect gift ideas for any occasion. Even ordering an Uber and getting personalized cooking recommendations. These Amazon AI Assistant functionalities painted a picture of a truly intelligent and helpful home companion, far beyond the basic Alexa we know. The anticipation was palpable, especially for those invested in creating a fully integrated smart home ecosystem. The Disappointing Reality: Delayed Alexa Features However, the initial launch of Alexa+ tells a different story. According to reports, many of these showcased Alexa Plus Features are conspicuously absent. Users who upgraded expecting a fully realized AI assistant are finding themselves with a service that feels‚Ä¶incomplete. Key functionalities like Grubhub ordering, story generation, visual person identification for chore reminders, and gift idea brainstorming are simply not available yet. It‚Äôs like ordering a fully loaded car and finding out it‚Äôs missing the navigation system and sunroof. Furthermore, some features, such as Uber ordering and cooking recommendations, are only available to a select group of users, making the rollout feel fragmented and inconsistent. The promised web app for Alexa+, which was announced with fanfare just last month, also lacks a firm release date, adding to the uncertainty. Why Are Key Smart Home AI Features Delayed? The culprit behind these Delayed Alexa Features seems to be the complex AI infrastructure underpinning Alexa+. Reports suggest that the development process has been plagued with challenges from the outset. Building an AI capable of handling the sophisticated ‚Äúagentic‚Äù tasks Amazon envisions is no small feat. It requires robust and reliable systems that can handle natural language processing, contextual understanding, and seamless integration with various services. Here‚Äôs a breakdown of the potential challenges: AI Infrastructure Complexity: Developing the AI models and systems to power these advanced features is inherently complex and time-consuming. Integration Hurdles: Seamlessly integrating with third-party services like Grubhub and Uber requires intricate partnerships and technical coordination. Performance and Reliability: Ensuring the AI is not only functional but also performs reliably and accurately across a wide range of user scenarios is crucial for a positive user experience. Scalability Issues: Rolling out these features to millions of users requires a scalable infrastructure that can handle the increased demand and data processing. What Does This Mean for Smart Home Enthusiasts? For those invested in Smart Home AI and eagerly awaiting the next leap in voice assistant technology, this delay is undoubtedly disappointing. It highlights the gap between marketing hype and the realities of developing cutting-edge AI. While Alexa+ still holds promise, the initial rollout serves as a reminder that revolutionary technology often comes with unforeseen challenges and delays. However, it‚Äôs important to remember that this is just the beginning. Amazon has committed to delivering these advanced features, and the current situation appears to be a temporary setback rather than a complete derailment. As AI technology continues to evolve rapidly, we can expect to see these capabilities gradually rolled out in the coming months. Actionable Insights: Managing Expectations and Future Outlook Here are some key takeaways and actionable insights as we navigate this evolving landscape: Manage Expectations: Don‚Äôt expect all promised Alexa+ features to be available immediately. Temper your expectations and anticipate a phased rollout. Stay Informed: Keep an eye on tech news and official Amazon announcements for updates on feature releases and timelines. Provide Feedback: If you are an early Alexa+ adopter, provide feedback to Amazon about your experience and feature requests. This can help shape future development. Patience is Key: Developing advanced AI is a marathon, not a sprint. Patience will be crucial as these sophisticated features are refined and rolled out. Conclusion: The Future of Alexa+ and Smart Home AI Remains Bright While the initial launch of Alexa+ may not have delivered all the promised bells and whistles, the underlying potential of Amazon AI Assistant and the future of Smart Home AI remains incredibly exciting. The current delays underscore the complexities of bringing truly intelligent AI into our homes, but also highlight the ambitious vision Amazon has for Alexa+. As the technology matures and these challenges are overcome, we can still look forward to a future where our smart homes are powered by truly intelligent and helpful AI assistants. To learn more about the latest advancements in the AI market, explore our articles on key developments shaping AI features and institutional adoption.

title: Will ETH Hit Rock Bottom at $1,200? Analyst Reveals His Buy Zone Strategy
body: ETH fell by 1.1% in the past 24 hours, sliding to just above $1,800 as analysts suggested the recent rally may have been a dead-cat bounce. Among the top five cryptocurrencies, Ethereum has posted the steepest losses in 2025, down 45.4% year-to-date. The network‚Äôs struggle to remain competitive has pressured the price of its native asset, with rival smart contract platforms like Solana (SOL) and Sui (SUI) offering lower fees and faster execution speeds. ETH Nears Critical $1,500 Support After Major Downtrend Crypto trader Big Cheds, who has more than 300,000 followers on X, pointed to the $1,200 level as a critical support and potential buy zone for ETH if the current downtrend continues. $ETH now $1840 from $3400 below. Prob worth a sniff when it tags $1200-$1300 range https://t.co/NARqJWgxS6 pic.twitter.com/w076n9xLIe ‚Äî Cheds Trading (@BigCheds) March 30, 2025 He noted that a bounce from this level could lead to a mid-term rally toward the $3,400 range, translating to a 283% gain. Looking at the weekly chart, ETH has been in a prolonged downtrend since it failed to break above $4,000 for the third time. This triple top pattern reflected investor hesitation in pushing valuations higher amid an uncertain macroeconomic backdrop. Despite these challenges, some technical levels have held firm. The $1,500 support zone has previously acted as a launching point for strong recoveries. ETH rebounded by 41% and 149% the last two times it touched this level, with each move resulting in a higher high. If a similar reaction occurs again, the price could target the $5,000 mark, which would represent a 221% increase. Can ETH Bounce Back or Is $1,200 the Next Stop? Whether ETH will hold its footing at $1,500 or continue slipping remains to be seen. A sustained drop below that level could send the price toward $1,200, and potentially as low as $900, implying a total downside risk of around 42% from current levels. Traders and long-term holders alike will be watching closely to see how ETH reacts to this zone. A strong bounce could reignite interest, while a bearish breakdown might confirm further downside in the short term. Once cryptos regain their strength and the bullish cycle resumes, storing these digital assets safely will be a key priority to investors. Best Wallet (BEST) has rapidly become one of the most promising crypto presales of 2025 as the project prepares to launch the most powerful Web 3 storage solution the industry has seen. Best Wallet (BEST) Raises $11.5M to Launch its Market-Leading Crypto Storage Solution Best Wallet (BEST) has captivated investors since its presale event kicked off in December last year. This crypto wallet will support assets in more than 60 different blockchains and will incorporate innovative tools and features like Upcoming Tokens, a crypto screener that allows investors to identify promising presale projects with immense upside potential. In addition, Best Wallet‚Äôs ambitious roadmap includes the launch of a decentralized exchange (DEX) and a debit card to allow users to pay for their daily expenses with crypto. $BEST is the wallet‚Äôs utility token. Its demand will likely explode as more and more users download the Best Wallet mobile app . To buy $BEST, simply head to the Best Wallet website and connect your wallet. You can either swap USDT or ETH for this token or use a credit or debit card to make your investment. The post Will ETH Hit Rock Bottom at $1,200? title: Revolutionary OpenAI Unveils Plans for New Open Source AI Language Model
body: Hold onto your hats, crypto and tech enthusiasts! The AI world is buzzing with a potentially seismic shift. OpenAI, the company behind the groundbreaking GPT models, has hinted at releasing a new ‚Äúopen‚Äù language model. Yes, you read that right ‚Äì ‚Äúopen‚Äù! This news is electrifying for those in the crypto space who understand the power of decentralization and open access. Could this be a game-changer for how generative AI is developed and utilized? Let‚Äôs dive into what this announcement means and why it‚Äôs creating waves. Why is an OpenAI Open Language Model a Big Deal? For years, OpenAI has been known for its cutting-edge, yet largely closed-source, AI models. Think of models like GPT-3 and GPT-4 ‚Äì incredibly powerful, but access is controlled and the underlying code isn‚Äôt freely available. This contrasts sharply with the ethos of the crypto world, which champions transparency and open-source development. However, it seems the winds are changing. OpenAI is signaling a move towards a more open approach, reminiscent of their earlier days with GPT-2 . But why now? Let‚Äôs break it down: Competitive Pressure: Companies like DeepSeek and Meta (with their Llama models) have gained significant traction by adopting an open source AI strategy. Meta‚Äôs Llama models, for instance, have seen over a billion downloads! This success likely hasn‚Äôt gone unnoticed by OpenAI. Community Demand: The AI research and development community has been vocal about the need for more open and accessible AI models . OpenAI‚Äôs feedback form directly addresses this, asking developers and researchers what they want to see in an open model. Sam Altman‚Äôs Perspective: Even OpenAI‚Äôs CEO, Sam Altman, has acknowledged that the company might have been on the ‚Äúwrong side of history‚Äù regarding open sourcing. His recent statements suggest an internal shift in thinking, even if it‚Äôs not universally shared within OpenAI. What Can We Expect from this New Open Source AI Model? While details are still emerging, here‚Äôs what we know and what we can infer about OpenAI‚Äôs upcoming open language model : Reasoning Capabilities: Altman mentioned that the model will have ‚Äúreasoning‚Äù capabilities similar to OpenAI‚Äôs o3-mini. This suggests it won‚Äôt be a basic model but will possess a degree of sophistication. Preparedness Framework: OpenAI emphasizes that this model, like all others, will undergo rigorous evaluation before release. However, they acknowledge the unique nature of an open-source model, anticipating modifications and adaptations post-release. Focus on Utility: OpenAI‚Äôs feedback form and statements highlight a desire to make this model as ‚Äúuseful as possible‚Äù for developers, researchers, and even large organizations. They envision scenarios where companies and governments might prefer to run models themselves, rather than relying solely on API access. The Benefits of Open Source AI: A Crypto Perspective For the crypto community, the move towards open source AI resonates deeply. Here‚Äôs why: Benefit Explanation Transparency & Trust Open source code allows for public scrutiny, fostering greater trust and transparency in AI development. This aligns with the core principles of blockchain technology. Innovation & Collaboration Open models encourage wider experimentation and collaboration. Just as open-source blockchain projects have thrived, open AI can spur rapid innovation through community contributions. Decentralization Potential Open source AI can contribute to a more decentralized AI landscape, reducing the concentration of power in a few large tech companies. This mirrors the crypto vision of decentralizing control. Accessibility & Democratization Open models lower the barrier to entry for AI development, making powerful tools accessible to a wider range of developers and researchers globally. Challenges and Considerations While the prospect of an OpenAI open language model is exciting, there are challenges to consider: Responsible Use: Open models can be used for malicious purposes. OpenAI will need to carefully consider safety and ethical implications, especially given the potential for modification post-release. Resource Intensity: Developing and maintaining powerful open models requires significant resources. OpenAI needs a sustainable strategy for this endeavor. Balancing Openness with Business Interests: OpenAI is a for-profit company. Finding the right balance between open sourcing and protecting their competitive advantage will be crucial. Actionable Insights: What Does This Mean for You? Whether you‚Äôre a crypto developer, investor, or simply an AI enthusiast, here‚Äôs how you can engage with this development: Participate in OpenAI‚Äôs Feedback Process: If you have ideas or insights on what you‚Äôd like to see in an open model, fill out OpenAI‚Äôs feedback form. Your input can directly shape the future of this model. Explore Existing Open Source AI Models: Familiarize yourself with models like Meta‚Äôs Llama, and DeepSeek‚Äôs offerings. Understanding the current landscape will help you appreciate OpenAI‚Äôs new model better. Consider the Implications for Crypto & AI Convergence: Think about how open AI models could be integrated with blockchain technology. Are there opportunities for decentralized AI applications, AI-powered crypto tools, or new intersections we haven‚Äôt yet imagined? Conclusion: A New Chapter for OpenAI and Open Source AI? OpenAI‚Äôs move towards releasing an open language model is a significant moment. It signals a potential shift in strategy, acknowledging the power of open source and the growing demand for accessible generative AI . For the crypto world, this development is particularly exciting, aligning with the values of transparency, decentralization, and community-driven innovation. While challenges remain, the potential benefits of a truly open and powerful AI model are immense. Keep your eyes peeled ‚Äì the coming months could mark a revolutionary chapter in the evolution of AI. To learn more about the latest generative AI trends, explore our article on key developments shaping AI models features .

title: Pundit Gives Dogecoin Price 30-40% Chance Of Crash To $0.165 As RSI Enters Oversold Levels
body: A recent Dogecoin analysis on TradingView has highlighted a potential scenario where DOGE could dip below the $0.165 mark before rebounding. The analyst, reviewing the 4-hour candlestick chart, pointed to extremely oversold RSI levels as a basis for this outlook. Although a bounce appears to be the more probable outcome, there is still a 30 to 40% chance of a short-term drop into deeper support territory. Dogecoin RSI Dips Below 10 On 4-Hour Chart To Possibly Extend Decline The Relative Strength Index (RSI) is a technical analysis indicator used to measure an asset‚Äôs momentum. When above 70, the asset is considered overbought, meaning it might be due for a price correction or pullback. On the other hand, readings below 30 are considered oversold, meaning that the asset might be undervalued and could bounce upward soon. Related Reading: Dogecoin Price Turns Bullish With 1-Day RSI In Oversold Region, Why DOGE Can Reach $0.9 In the case of Dogecoin, the meme coin has been under intense selling pressure since the beginning of March. This selling pressure has seen it lose most of its price gains in late 2024 and break below notable support pressure. This, in turn, has seen the RSI fall towards the oversold levels across multiple timeframes. According to the technical overview, the Relative Strength Index on the 1-hour timeframe is between 25 and 27, signaling strong oversold conditions. On the 4-hour chart, the RSI has dropped even lower, falling beneath 10, which typically indicates an asset is due for a corrective bounce. The daily RSI is currently hovering around 32 to 33, still above the oversold zone but trending downward. These readings suggest that while bearish pressure is present, the setup of a bounce from oversold levels increasingly favors a rebound as buyers look to re-enter near support. Analyst Sees Bounce Toward $0.172‚Äì$0.175 As More Probable Outcome According to the analyst, the break of the RSI below the oversold levels points to a decline toward the $0.1580 and $0.1590 support region. Despite the possibility of a decline toward the $0.1580 to $0.1590 support region, the analyst noted a higher probability (around 60 to 70%) of a near-term bounce after hitting this support region, possibly targeting the $0.172 to $0.175 range. Related Reading: Dogecoin Price Stages Bounce From Lower Border Of Second Falling Wedge, New Targets Unlocked? The projection hinges on Dogecoin‚Äôs possible reaction to such a deeply oversold RSI level. The analyst emphasized that this is an assumption rather than financial advice, but the technical context supports the likelihood of a relief rally if the support holds. At the time of writing, Dogecoin is trading at $0.1649, down by 3.6% in the past 24 hours. With both downside and upside scenarios laid out, short-term Dogecoin price action now depends on how the market reacts at the current $0.165 level. A move toward $0.172 or higher could unfold quickly if buyers step in right now. However, if selling continues, Dogecoin might continue its decline throughout the week before attempting a recovery. Featured image from Unsplash, chart from Tradingview.com

body: What if the biggest crypto opportunities were right in front of you, and you just needed to recognize them? The crypto market never sleeps, and right now, Qubetics ($TICS), Bittensor (TAO), and Tron (TRX) are making headlines with major developments. Bittensor is transforming artificial intelligence by decentralizing machine learning models, while Tron is pushing deeper into decentralized applications and Web3 infrastructure. As the world‚Äôs first Web3 aggregator, it‚Äôs solving one of crypto‚Äôs biggest problems‚Äîbridging fragmented blockchain ecosystems. More importantly, its Real World Asset (RWA) Tokenization Marketplace is unlocking new ways for people and businesses to trade real-world assets on-chain. Qubetics is changing that through Real World Asset (RWA) tokenization, which converts these physical assets into digital tokens that can be bought, sold, or used as collateral on the blockchain. A real estate owner, for example, can tokenize a luxury apartment, allowing people across the globe to own fractional shares. No need for hefty down payments or complex legal paperwork‚Äîjust direct access to real estate ownership through blockchain technology. The same applies to high-value assets like gold, oil, patents, and even rare collectibles, making Qubetics a game-changer in asset digitization. Qubetics is also a Web3 aggregator, meaning it unifies multiple blockchains, eliminating the headache of cross-chain compatibility. title: Russia‚Äôs Irkutsk ‚ÄòCould Impose Year-round Crypto Mining Ban from April 1‚Äô
body: Russia‚Äôs Irkutsk , the nation‚Äôs biggest Bitcoin mining hotspot, could impose a year-round ban on all crypto mining activities effective April 1, a news outlet has claimed. Per a report from the Russian newspaper Kommersant , the ban would apply only in the southern part of the Siberian oblast of Irkutsk, but could run until mid-2031. Irkutsk Mining Ban Incoming? Miners in southern Irkutsk have already been ordered to shut down their rigs in the winter months until 2031. Inside a crypto mining data center in Irkutsk, Russia. (Source: GetBailkal/YouTube/Screenshot) But many miners have remained in the area on the understanding that they can operate unimpeded in warmer months. However, top officials warned earlier this year that the existing ban was not doing enough to ease pressure on local power grids. Kommersant, a media outlet known to enjoy good relations with the Kremlin, said its sources had revealed the Russian government ‚Äúmay impose a total ban on mining in the southern part of the Irkutsk region as early as April 1.‚Äù As Russia‚Äôs first BTC mining hub, southern Irkutsk is home to several large mining centers, which collectively consume around 650 MW of power. A total ban would be highly problematic to these centers, industry insiders told the newspaper. They added that ‚Äúin the event of a ban,‚Äù they would be powerless to act ‚Äúdue to difficulties connecting to networks in other regions.‚Äù Many nearby regions have also imposed wintertime crypto mining bans, a fact that could leave miners with no choice other than to relocate. Trump ‚Äòp‚Äîed off‚Äô with Putin as Ukraine ceasefire talks stall https://t.co/2xkkA64x13 ‚Äî The Telegraph (@Telegraph) March 30, 2025 Governors Intervenes As previously reported, Irkutsk Governor Igor Kobzev wrote to the Kremlin earlier this year to ask for its cooperation . Kobzev said the power currently provided to miners should be used to ‚Äúimplement socio-economic tasks that are important for the region.‚Äù Irkutsk Governor Igor Kobzev. (Source: AIST TV/YouTube/Screenshot) The media outlet noted that neither the Ministry of Energy nor the offices of the Governor of the Irkutsk Oblast responded to its request for official comment. However, the outlet reported that President Vladimir Putin had replied that he had agreed to ‚Äúconsider and support‚Äù Kobzev‚Äôs request ‚Äúin the interests of the region.‚Äù The newspaper claimed its (anonymous) sources said the matter was discussed at a government-led power industry summit in Moscow on March 27. ‚ÄúBased on the results of the meeting, [the government] will likely decide to grant the [governor‚Äôs request],‚Äù Kommersant‚Äôs ‚Äúsources‚Äù claimed. Sergei Bezdelov, the head of the nation‚Äôs biggest crypto mining group, the Industrial Mining Association, said his association was ‚Äúagainst any form of prohibition.‚Äù A church in central Irkutsk, Russia. (Source: Fanzuga [CC BY-SA 3.0]) North of Region to Escape Ban? Kobzev has previously claimed that his plans would leave industrial miners in the north of the oblast free to continue with their work. But Kobzev has claimed that power shortages in southern Irkutsk are now becoming critical. He stated that ‚Äúover the past five years,‚Äù energy consumption in the Irkutsk region has ‚Äúgrown by 28%‚Äù The governor blamed mining for contributing to an energy deficit in the region. He said that the deficit could grow to 2.9 GW by 2030 if no action were taken. The entirety of Siberia has become a hub for Russian crypto miners due to its low electricity prices and famously long and cold winters. Officials think that total mining load in the region now stands at 1.066 GW, with miners in the north using 419 MW and southern miners using 647 MW. Legal, industrial miners account for the vast majority (84%) of the energy usage. Kobzev said that mining firms have already obtained permission to bring another 1.272 GW of capacity online in the area. Russia and the United States have started talks on joint rare earth metals and other projects in Russia, and some companies have already expressed an interest in them, President Vladimir Putin's investment envoy said https://t.co/VMYTz33cgb ‚Äî Reuters (@Reuters) March 31, 2025 Irkutsk Mining Bans Already Helping Save Energy, Officials Claim Irkutsk officials say that the existing ban, which came into force in January this year, has already helped reduce monthly power consumption by 305 MW per month. Kobzev also claimed that small-scale, quasi-legal crypto miners are also causing a drain on the local grid. He stated that ‚Äúcommercial consumers operating at low voltages‚Äù were using over 160 MW of power per month. A leading Russian economist has warned Moscow against developing a national strategic Bitcoin reserve, calling crypto stockpiles a ‚Äúticking time bomb.‚Äù #BitcoinReserve #Russia https://t.co/MSkCrobQPI ‚Äî Cryptonews.com (@cryptonews) March 27, 2025 Despite the power issues in Siberia, Irkutsk energy prices for consumers using over 10 MW per month are still ‚Äúamong the most attractive in the country,‚Äù Kommersant wrote. The media outlet wrote that commercial and industrial consumers typically pay prices of around 5 rubles ($0.059) per kWh. Most Russian crypto mining experts think that around 90% of domestic industrial miners focus their efforts on Bitcoin (BTC) . The post Russia‚Äôs Irkutsk ‚ÄòCould Impose Year-round Crypto Mining Ban from April 1‚Äô appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Tesla‚Äôs shares are down 35% YTD amid widespread protests and vandalism
body: Tesla‚Äôs shares have fallen more than 35% so far this year, and the automaker has become the focus of heated protests across the country due to Musk‚Äôs involvement in DOGE (Department of Government Efficiency). On Sunday, Musk said he believed his role in DOGE was affecting Tesla‚Äôs share price. He spoke about the matter during a town hall event in Wisconsin, where he has been campaigning in the state‚Äôs supreme court election.¬†According to Musk, those who oppose his efforts to slash government jobs under President Donald Trump‚Äôs administration have tried to pressure him by going after Tesla. Musk speaking at a Town Hall event in Wisconsin. Source: Fox 9 ‚ÄúWhat they‚Äôre trying to do is put massive pressure on me, and Tesla I guess, to ‚Ä¶ stop doing this,‚Äù Musk said, referring to his work with the Trump White House. ‚ÄúMy Tesla stock and the stock of everyone who holds Tesla has gone, went roughly in half. I mean it‚Äôs a big deal.‚Äù Tesla‚Äôs share price was already down 35.83% for the year before Monday‚Äôs market opening, which means that the stock has nearly been cut in half compared to its peak in December. Shares slid another 1.7% on Monday. Despite this downturn, Musk offered some hope for shareholders, calling the price drop a possible ‚Äúbuying opportunity‚Äù for people who believe in the company‚Äôs long-term prospects. Tesla stock price chart. Source: Google Finance Musk was in Wisconsin to support a conservative candidate in a closely watched supreme court election. He has contributed more than $12 million on the campaign, in addition to giving $1 million each to two voters at a rally on Sunday for signing a petition against what he described as ‚Äúactivist judges.‚Äù Though Musk‚Äôs political influence has come into the spotlight recently, signs of trouble at Tesla had already begun to appear. The electric car maker‚Äôs vehicle deliveries declined in 2024, and preliminary figures suggest sales continue to slump this year in key markets like Europe. Other car manufacturers in the U.S. have also stumbled amid warnings about rising tariffs on imported goods. Potential trade conflicts could disrupt a tightly woven network of parts suppliers spread across the U.S., Canada, and Mexico, causing more problems for an industry still recovering from past supply chain challenges. Tesla‚Äôs troubles, then, may be part of a broader challenge facing American automakers. Yet many see the Tesla case as unique because of Musk‚Äôs sudden shift into high-profile politics. Since the Trump administration began in January, Musk has become a familiar face around the White House. He publicly campaigned with Trump in 2024, regularly offers opinions on political matters through his social media company X, and now holds a top seat in DOGE. For critics, this raises concerns about where Musk‚Äôs focus lies: on running an electric vehicle firm or serving as a powerful government insider. Protestors swarmed Tesla‚Äôs showrooms on the weekend Protests escalated on Saturday as anti-Musk activists swarmed Tesla showrooms and service centers. They called it the ‚ÄúTesla Takedown.‚Äù According to the protestors, the goal was to oppose Musk‚Äôs political activities and his efforts to slash government spending under Trump. Musk has already gained access to the highly sensitive information of federal employees. Consequently, more than 277 Tesla locations across the country saw some form of demonstration, though the size of the crowd varied by city. In states like New Jersey, Massachusetts, Connecticut, and New York, turnouts ranged from a few dozen to several hundred. People held signs reading, ‚ÄúHonk if you hate Elon‚Äù and ‚ÄúFight the billionaire broligarchy.‚Äù In Texas, Musk‚Äôs home state, and in Minnesota, Maryland, and other parts of the country, similar protests took place. Social media images showed picketers standing in front of Tesla showrooms, chanting slogans and waving banners. A protestor outside a Tesla store in Texas. Source: CBS Texas A small but visible group of counterprotesters also gathered at some locations, voicing support for President Trump and, by extension, Musk. In Dublin, California, across from a showroom where dozens of activists chanted, a few Trump supporters waved American flags. A bigger protest was observed near Berkeley, where participants claimed that Musk‚Äôs ties to the administration were pushing the country in a dangerous direction. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre living in a fascist state,‚Äù said a retired high school teacher at the Berkeley demonstration. ‚ÄúWe need to stop this or we‚Äôll lose our whole country and everything that is good about the United States.‚Äù Protesters should up with various signs calling Elon a ‚ÄúFascist.‚Äù Source: ABC News Outside the U.S., anti-Musk sentiment is also growing. Protesters gathered at more than 230 Tesla sites worldwide, including in European cities like London. Though the crowds there were smaller, the messages were similar. Signs compared Musk to Adolf Hitler and accused him of using a straight-arm salute after Trump‚Äôs inauguration. The protest in London drew a handful of Americans living abroad who felt compelled to speak out. One participant in London held a sign labeling Tesla cars as ‚ÄúSwasticars,‚Äù a jarring reference to Nazi Germany. ‚ÄúWe just want to get loud, make noise, make people aware of the problems that we‚Äôre facing,‚Äù said one of the protesters, describing Musk‚Äôs alliance with the Trump White House as a risk for democracy. The Tesla Takedown movement was organized by a coalition that includes people who once owned Tesla vehicles, public figures like actor John Cusack, and some Democratic lawmakers. Rep. Jasmine Crockett from Dallas said on a recent organizing call that she would keep ‚Äúscreaming in the halls of Congress‚Äù to highlight Musk‚Äôs actions. On Saturday, Rep. Pramila Jayapal appeared at a protest in Seattle, describing Musk‚Äôs role in DOGE as a ‚Äúdangerous mixing of corporate power and government access.‚Äù A mother showed up to my recent town hall, crying because she was worried about being able to access health care for her new baby. This is Donald Trump ‚Äî breaking institutions, sowing chaos and confusion, and striking fear into Americans. No matter your politics, that‚Äôs wrong. pic.twitter.com/da4FtqZWDv ‚Äî Rep. Pramila Jayapal (@RepJayapal) March 31, 2025 Some individuals have reportedly set Tesla vehicles on fire, an act that U.S. Attorney General Pam Bondi has condemned as domestic terrorism. Musk, for his part, has labeled those committing these crimes as ‚Äúpsychos‚Äù and asked them to stop. Authorities in Germany are investigating a blaze that destroyed seven Tesla cars early Saturday, though it was unclear if it was connected to the broader protests. In Watertown, Massachusetts, local police said a black pickup side mirror struck two people at a demonstration outside a Tesla service center. Thankfully, there were no serious injuries, and officials quickly identified the suspect. Cryptopolitan Academy: Tired of market swings? Learn how DeFi can help you build steady passive income. Register Now

title: Coinbase Stocks Slide Over 30% This Quarter, Matching Post-FTX Collapse Lows
body: Shares of Coinbase (COIN), the largest crypto exchange in the US, have faced significant declines during the first quarter (Q1) of the year, primarily due to escalating concerns about the US economy and its impact on digital assets. Coinbase And Others Face Increased Volatility According to Bloomberg, Coinbase‚Äôs stock has dropped more than 30% since the beginning of the quarter, marking its worst performance since the collapse of the FTX exchange in late 2022. This decline is reflective of a broader trend affecting nearly all major crypto-linked stocks, including companies like Galaxy Digital Holdings (GLXY.TO), Riot Platforms (RIOT), and Core Scientific (CORZ). Related Reading: XRP Bull Cycle Could End If This Happens: Analyst The cryptocurrency market itself is experiencing turmoil, with Bitcoin (BTC) falling over 20% from its all-time high and Ethereum (ETH) plummeting more than 45% in value. These shifts come amid President Donald Trump‚Äôs escalation of a ‚Äúglobal trade war,‚Äù which has stirred fears about the health of the country‚Äôs economy. Economic data has exacerbated these concerns, pushing the S&P 500 Index (GSPC) toward its worst quarter since mid-2022. Oppenheimer analyst Owen Lau noted that many within the cryptocurrency community recognize that the current market conditions are not primarily driven by fundamental factors. Instead, Lau emphasized that macroeconomic issues‚Äîsuch as tariffs and the potential trade war‚Äîare influencing investor sentiment significantly. The looming threat of a recession has reportedly added to the unease, causing higher-risk crypto-linked stocks to be even more volatile than Bitcoin itself. Lau explains that investments in companies like Coinbase carry additional risks, including the potential for bankruptcy, allegedly making them particularly susceptible to swift sell-offs. Cryptocurrency Market Struggles To Rebound The current state of the cryptocurrency market is a stark contrast to the optimism that prevailed at the start of the year, following Trump‚Äôs election. Bitcoin reached a record high of over $109,000 on Inauguration Day. Earlier this month, Bitcoin prices fell after Trump announced a strategic reserve for the market‚Äôs leading crypto, but did not allocate taxpayer funds to expand it. As of now, Bitcoin trades around $83,000, still above pre-election levels but far from its peak. Related Reading: Ethereum To $20K? Investor Says Real-World Adoption Holds The Key While shares of various crypto-related companies surged following the election, Coinbase and crypto miners have since relinquished those gains. Notably, Michael Saylor‚Äôs Strategy (MSTR) is among the few stocks in the sector that has managed to remain in positive territory since November 5. Despite the downturn, the cryptocurrency industry continues to gain influence in Washington and is moving closer to integration with traditional financial systems. However, this growing power has yet to translate into a market rebound. Connor Loewen, a cryptocurrency analyst at 3iQ, expressed skepticism about the current state of investor sentiment, stating, ‚ÄúWhat we saw a couple of months ago, I don‚Äôt know how much crazier it can get than that. I think we‚Äôre going to have to be looking for new catalysts.‚Äù Featured image from DALL-E, chart from TradingView.com

title: Bitcoin reserve proponent S≈Çawomir Mentzen ticks up in polls ahead of Poland‚Äôs presidential election
body: The candidate suggesting Poland should set up its own Bitcoin reserve has been rising in polls ahead of the EU nation‚Äôs presidential vote in May. Over the past weeks, since he vowed to turn Poland into a crypto haven, S≈Çawomir Mentzen has moved closer to participating in a likely run-off in June. The nationalist candidate is most popular among young Poles who often flock to his rallies. Observers say this is largely due to his quite active presence on social media. Mentzen has been also attracting followers with a program that draws inspiration from U.S. President Donald Trump‚Äôs political messages. Mentzen approaches run-off territory in recent Polish polls Polish voters will be going to the ballot boxes on May 18 to elect their new president this year. The incumbent, Andrzej Duda, is nearing the end of his second and last five-year term in office and won‚Äôt be able to run again under the country‚Äôs constitution. While none of the leading candidates is expected to win in the first round, Warsaw mayor Rafa≈Ç Trzaskowski, nominated by Prime Minister Donald Tusk‚Äôs center-right, liberal-conservative Civic Platform (PO) party is the clear front-runner. Second in opinion polls is historian Karol Nawrocki, head of the Institute of National Remembrance, who is backed by President Duda‚Äôs right-wing, national-conservative Law and Justice party (PiS) party. His place in the potential second round on June 1 is now challenged by S≈Çawomir Mentzen. Co za zako≈Ñczenie dnia! Dziƒôkujƒô O≈Çawa! Jeste≈õcie niesamowici! pic.twitter.com/lTNSMIfroh ‚Äî S≈Çawomir Mentzen (@SlawomirMentzen) March 29, 2025 The latter is the candidate of the far-right political alliance Confederation Liberty and Independence (Konfederacja). He launched his campaign at the end of August, earlier than his competitors, and has been narrowing the gap between him and the mainstream leaders. Mentzen is still third in the race but a survey conducted by the Polish research company Opinia24 in mid-March showed him with 18.9%, less than a percentage point behind Nawrocki at 19.5%. Trzaskowski is well ahead of both with the support of 32% of the respondents, although that‚Äôs not enough for a first round win. The results were published by RMF24 which ordered the poll. The Polish news outlet highlighted S≈Çawomir Mentzen‚Äôs continuous gain over the past few months. He has added 2 percentage points since February and is 8 points above his December score. Pro-crypto presidential candidate leads among young voters Polling numbers quoted by Politico are also registering Mentzen‚Äôs ascend throughout the race but pointing to a larger difference between him and Nawrocki. RMF24 noted, however, that Opinia24‚Äôs pre-election forecast for the 2023 parliamentary vote, when Mentzen won a seat in the Polish Sejm , was credited as the most accurate. Young Poles is the segment where Mentzen confidently leads, according to Opinia. Some 46% of those aged 18 to 29 have declared their intention to vote for Konfederacja‚Äôs 38-year-old candidate. He is also ranked first by Polish citizens in the 30-39 bracket and has a slight advantage over Trzaskowski among male voters. S≈Çawomir Mentzen has been relying heavily on popular platforms like Tiktok and X as well as Youtube to convey his views, a mix of conservative, nationalistic and libertarian ideas. He ‚Äúhas made social media his home,‚Äù the European political news website Euractiv pointed out in a recent article. His election program titled ‚ÄúStrong Rich Poland‚Äù abounds with political messages mirroring Donald Trump‚Äôs campaign promises such as ensuring ‚Äútight borders,‚Äù providing ‚Äúdefense of free speech,‚Äù ‚Äúreducing bureaucracy,‚Äù and introducing ‚Äúlow and simple taxes.‚Äù He insists ‚ÄúPoland needs a strong army‚Äù but says ‚ÄúNo to Polish troops in Ukraine.‚Äù Poland should create a Strategic Bitcoin Reserve. If I become the President of Poland, our country will become a cryptocurrency haven, with very friendly regulations, low taxes, and a supportive approach from banks and regulators. BTC to the Moon! pic.twitter.com/izKc4spkkV ‚Äî S≈Çawomir Mentzen (@SlawomirMentzen) November 17, 2024 A full paragraph in his 20-point platform is dedicated to crypto. The Polish state fights it because it can‚Äôt control it, Mentzen says, vowing ‚Äúto strive to free up cryptocurrency trading‚Äù and ‚Äúensure Poland has the most crypto-friendly law in the entire European Union.‚Äù In a post on X in November, he also embraced Trump‚Äôs bitcoin reserve initiative. S≈Çawomir Mentzen holds a degree in physics and a PhD in economics after defending a doctoral thesis on public debt at the Nicolaus Copernicus University in his hometown of Toru≈Ñ. Besides politics, he has been involved in business as well, having owned a law firm and a beer brand. Cryptopolitan Academy: Tired of market swings? title: Nvidia stock sinks 4% as Trump‚Äôs tariff plans rattle AI trade
body: Nvidia shares fell over 4% early Monday after US President Donald Trump delivered a stern message about trade tariffs. Trump said on Sunday that no country would be given any special treatment regarding tariffs. He also signed new trade policies into effect on April 2 , which he calls ‚ÄúLiberation Day.‚Äù This frightened investors, who had expected a softer trade stance. Trump‚Äôs remarks set off a market-wide sell-off led by tech stocks . Shares in Tesla fell over 5%, the biggest decline for the ‚ÄúMagnificent Seven‚Äù tech behemoths. Already in the‚ÄÇcrosshairs of new trade restrictions, Nvidia saw its stock also tumble. New tariffs disrupt Nvidia‚Äôs role in the AI arms race An imminent 25% tariff from the US government on goods‚ÄÇfrom Mexico and Canada directly impacts Nvidia . The company produces advanced graphics‚ÄÇprocessing units (GPUs) in artificial intelligence (AI) servers. So, many of these AI servers are put together in Mexico and driven across the border into the US. According to trade data, the US imported $43 billion in computers, including AI servers,‚ÄÇfrom Mexico in 2024. The company expects new tariffs to increase the cost of such servers, which could decrease demand for‚ÄÇNvidia‚Äôs AI chips. Taiwan, also a key source of‚ÄÇNvidia‚Äôs GPU supply, could also see the extension of trade controls. In 2024, the US imported $33‚ÄÇbillion worth of computer parts, including Nvidia-powered printed circuit boards, from Taiwan. The tech firm‚Äôs production costs could increase if Trump hits Taiwan with more tariffs. Nvidia gears up for major‚ÄÇchanges ahead The short-term effects of the tariffs will take time to play out, but Nvidia is already‚ÄÇlooking ahead. At its latest GTC conference , CEO Jensen Huang answered questions‚ÄÇabout trade restrictions, specifying that export control restrictions concerning artificial intelligence and China were the reason behind the firm‚Äôs challenges. He acknowledged that tariffs would have ‚Äúa little impact‚Äù on the company in the‚ÄÇshort term, but he also stressed‚ÄÇthat Nvidia is pursuing longer-term solutions. One important step toward that goal is expanding production in the US. Huang cited Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company (TSMC) ‚Äòs $100 billion investment to develop new chip factories in the United States. TSMC is a major manufacturing partner for Nvidia, and the move potentially helps mitigate overreliance on overseas factories in the future. However, Nvidia‚Äôs stock has‚ÄÇfaced pressure in 2025. As of Monday morning, it had fallen almost 22% from the start of‚ÄÇthe year. Before Trump made his most‚ÄÇrecent comments, analysts said the stock market had yet to fully digest the new tariffs‚Äô impact. Now, some financial experts are cautioning that‚ÄÇinvestors should also consider how these longer-term rules governing trade will inform the industry. Even before Trump‚Äôs latest remarks, some analysts had cautioned that the market was not yet‚ÄÇproperly pricing the full effects of these tariffs. According to Josh Schafer of Yahoo Finance reports, many investors underestimated the extent and scope of Trump‚Äôs‚ÄÇtrade policies. The market now sees how serious and long-term these tariffs‚ÄÇcould be, said Henrietta Treyz, an economic policy expert at Veda Partners. Cryptopolitan Academy: Want to grow your money in 2025? Learn how to do it with DeFi in our upcoming webclass. Save Your Spot

title: Warning Signs Emerge: Analysts Say Bitcoin‚Äôs Recent Rise May Have Been a Mirage
body: After showing signs of recovery last week, Bitcoin appears to have lost its upward momentum once again. The cryptocurrency was closing in on the $90,000 psychological level but has since reversed direction, falling by 6.4% over the past week to hover around $82,000 at the time of writing. This decline has placed renewed attention on market metrics that suggest the rally may have been short-lived. Amid this downward movement, several on-chain analysts have raised questions about whether recent price trends reflect real demand or speculative behavior. Particularly, insights from CryptoQuant contributors point to warning signs, including a divergence between market capitalization and actual network activity. Related Reading: Bitcoin Weekly Preview: Tariffs, Whales, And Volatility Ahead NVT Indicator Signals Caution Amid Low Transaction Volume In a recent post titled ‚ÄúManipulative Moves or True Value? A Bitcoin and NVT Analysis,‚Äù CryptoQuant analyst BorisVest pointed to the Network Value to Transactions (NVT) ratio as a critical metric for understanding current market dynamics. The NVT ratio is calculated by dividing Bitcoin‚Äôs market capitalization by its daily transaction volume. According to BorisVest, Bitcoin‚Äôs elevated NVT Golden Cross reading indicates a high market cap against low transaction activity ‚Äî a combination that historically suggests price inflation driven by speculative interest rather than organic growth. BorisVest emphasized that periods with a high NVT often precede market corrections. In contrast, when the NVT falls into the green zone ‚Äî signaling a low market cap with rising transaction volume ‚Äî it may present a stronger foundation for price appreciation. As of now, the metric suggests Bitcoin‚Äôs recent price rise lacks transactional support, and continued pullbacks remain possible unless volume returns to the network. Bitcoin Speculators Absent, Sentiment Remains Cautious Adding to the cautious outlook, another CryptoQuant contributor known as crypto sunmoon highlighted the role of leverage in driving crypto bull markets. The analyst pointed out that funding rates have recently ‚Äúdead-crossed,‚Äù which occurs when short-term funding rates fall below long-term rates, often indicating bearish sentiment among traders. According to sunmoon, this shift suggests that speculators are currently unwilling to take on risk ‚Äî a key component needed to fuel bullish price movements. The analyst concluded that the return of speculative trading behavior, typically marked by rising funding rates and leveraged positions, is essential for reigniting upward momentum in Bitcoin. Related Reading: Bitcoin Rising Wedge: Expert Warns Of Imminent Breakdown In Coming Days Until then, market sentiment may remain subdued, with sideways or declining price action more likely. According to these CryptoQuant analysts, watching Bitcoin‚Äôs transaction volumes and funding trends will be crucial in determining whether Bitcoin is set for a renewed breakout or further consolidation. title: ChatGPT To Launch Next Big Model, Another Studio Ghibli Boom Ahead?
body: OpenAI, the firm behind ChatGPT, has disclosed its plans to introduce a new open-weight language model in the coming months. This will be the firm‚Äôs first open-weight release since GPT-2, a decision that had been delayed due to other priorities but now feels essential. Per the update, the novel model is expected to bring strong reasoning capabilities and provide simplicity for developers and organizations. From OpenAI ChatGPT to Sora It is worth mentioning that Sam Altman, OpenAI‚Äôs CEO, shared the news on X, expressing excitement about making the model highly effective. More importantly, this announcement follows OpenAI‚Äôs history of launching novel AI products. Since the release of ChatGPT in 2022, the tool has become widely used for text-based tasks. This Large Language Model transformed how people from different parts of the world interact with artificial intelligence . As reported by CoinGape, In 2024, OpenAI introduced Sora, an advanced video generation model. In addition, the release of voice Chat further improved AI‚Äôs role by allowing seamless spoken interactions. Interestingly, these notable innovations have redefined how AI integrates into daily life. Now, OpenAI is moving toward open-weight models. This will allow greater customization. For example, businesses, developers, and governments that prefer self-hosted AI solutions will be able to modify the model for specific needs. This new project could lead to wider adoption and new applications across various industries. ChatGPT Developer Involvement and Future Trends Before releasing the project to the public, OpenAI seeks developers‚Äô input through a series of sessions. According to Sam Altman, the events will begin in San Francisco, followed by meetings in Europe and the Asia-Pacific region. As detailed, developers will gain early access to prototypes, providing insight into potential applications. Altman confirmed that OpenAI will evaluate the model using its preparedness framework. Since open-weight models can be altered post-release, additional security measures will be implemented. By involving developers early, OpenAI intends to fuse innovation and responsibility. This will ensure that the model is both effective and safe for people to use. Another Studio Ghibli Trend Ahead? It is important to add that AI-generated Studio Ghibli-style artwork has shown how artificial intelligence can shape creative industries. For context, when OpenAI added image generation to ChatGPT-4o, people started making Studio Ghibli-style portraits, and the trend quickly spread. Even Elon Musk joined the Ghibli trend . Still, this new trend has raised certain questions about the future of creative art. Still, with OpenAI‚Äôs new model on the way, another wave of AI-generated content could take off. As AI keeps improving, it may bring new ways for people to create and share. The post ChatGPT To Launch Next Big Model, Another Studio Ghibli Boom Ahead? appeared first on CoinGape .

title: Privacy Pools launch on Ethereum, with Vitalik demoing the feature
body: A new semi-permissionless privacy tool, Privacy Pools, has launched on Ethereum, allowing users to transact privately while proving their funds aren‚Äôt linked to illicit activities. The privacy tool, launched by Ethereum builders 0xbow.io on March 31, earned support from the likes of Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin, who not only backed the privacy project but made one of the first deposits on the platform. 0xbow.io said that it implements ‚ÄúAssociation Sets‚Äù to batch transactions into the anonymous Privacy Pools and that a screening test is conducted to ensure that those transactions aren‚Äôt linked to illicit actors, such as hackers, phishers and scammers. gm Ethereum ‚òÄÔ∏è It is our great honor to announce the mainnet launch of Privacy Pools! ETH users can now achieve on-chain privacy, while still dissociating from illicit funds It is now up to all of us to Make Privacy Normal Again ü´° More info in this thread üëá pic.twitter.com/3nJO0AxoD1 ‚Äî 0xbow.io (@0xbowio) March 31, 2025 The Association Sets are ‚Äúdynamic‚Äù ‚Äî meaning that if a transaction is admitted but later found to be illicit, it can be removed from the set without disrupting any other deposits, 0xbow.io said. If a deposit is disqualified, the user can click the ‚Äúragequit‚Äù function to return the funds to their original deposit address. The innovation is part of 0xbow.io‚Äôs vision to ‚ÄúMake Privacy Normal Again‚Äù while also attempting to achieve regulatory compliance. Privacy protocols have received considerable backlash from regulators in recent years due to their increasing use by illicit actors to launder funds. One of those privacy tools, Tornado Cash, was sanctioned by the US Treasury‚Äôs Office of Foreign Assets Control (OFAC) between August 2022 and March 2025 after it was linked to around $7 billion laundered by the North Korean state-backed Lazarus Group. Tornado Cash has since been removed from OFAC‚Äôs blacklist after a US appeals court said the sanctions were unlawful in January 2025. 0xbow.io noted that initial deposits are limited to 1 Ether ( ETH ) but that the limit would be raised once the privacy protocol is more battle-tested. Privacy Pools inspired by Buterin and others Over 21 ETH has already been transferred into Privacy Pools from 69 deposits, including at least one from Buterin, 0xbow.io noted. Source: Vitalik Buterin In addition to Buterin, 0xbow.io said it also received investment support from Number Group, BanklessVC, Public Works and several angel investors. Related: Privacy isn‚Äôt a luxury in crypto, it‚Äôs a necessity ‚Äî Midnight CEO 0xbow.io also praised Buterin, Chainalysis Chief Scientist Jacob Illum, and two academics at the University of Basel in Switzerland for crafting a September 2023 white paper outlining how Privacy Pools could be built. 0xbow.io strategic adviser Ameen Soleimani also contributed to the paper, which has seen over 12,000 downloads and has been cited in nine other papers. The Privacy Pool code also passed a successful audit from Audit Wizard. a smart contract auditing firm co-founded by former Apple engineer Joe van Loon. More than $41 billion worth of illicit transfers were made in 2024, which made up 0.14% of total onchain volume for the year, according to the Chainalysis 2025 Crypto Crime report published on Jan. 15. While it marked around an 11% fall from 2023, Chainalysis said that figure could climb to around $51 billion as more criminal-tied addresses are found. Magazine: What are native rollups? Full guide to Ethereum‚Äôs latest innovation
