title: Circle could file for IPO by late April, reports
body: Circle Internet Financial is reportedly partnering with JPMorgan Chase and Citi to finally move ahead with its long-awaited IPO plans. The company has not confirmed any date to publicly list its shares, but reports have it Circle is looking at a late April date. Other multinational companies have followed a similar path to solidify their market presence. Tech giants like Alphabet Inc. and Meta expanded on a global scale and improved product development through their IPOs. Fintech firms such as Coinbase and Robinhood have also entered the public markets to establish themselves as staples of the financial sector. Circle‚Äôs attempts at public listing Circle initially attempted to go public through a merger with a special purpose acquisition company (SPAC), Concord Acquisition Corp., in 2021, which would have put its valuation at $9 billion. However, it abandoned those plans in late 2022 due to increased regulatory scrutiny and unfavorable market conditions following the collapse of the FTX crypto exchange. The company, unwilling to give up, confidentially filed for an IPO in early 2024. In Circle‚Äôs CEO, Jeremy Allaire‚Äôs words : ‚ÄúWe are very committed to the path of going public. We think we can be a really interesting company in public markets.‚Äù Circle announced plans to relocate its global headquarters from Boston to New York City in 2024 as part of preparations for its public debut. That move was expected to be finalized in early 2025, but it is yet to be confirmed. The proposed headquarters at the One World Trade Center would have positioned Circle in close proximity to major financial institutions and eased its integration with traditional financial firms. While Circle‚Äôs confidential IPO filing occurred over a year ago, the decision to make the paperwork public has created an opportunity for a deep look at Circle‚Äôs financials. It also marks the final step towards a public listing of its shares. The public filing also discloses the company‚Äôs proposed ticker symbol. Circle‚Äôs offering would be the biggest crypto IPO since Coinbase went public in 2021 using a direct listing. JPMorgan and Citi were also a part of the team that served as financial advisors for the Coinbase listing, according to regulatory filings. Market conditions and regulatory approval Circle‚Äôs IPO comes at an opportune time for the company as the market for new public listings has improved significantly from 2024. So far this year, 73 companies have gone public on U.S. exchanges, which shows a 70% increase from 2024. The total value of those deals was $11.8B, a 39% increase from the same time period in the previous year, according to data from Dealogic. Several well-known companies, including eToro, Stubhub and Klarna have also filed to go public. As crypto exploded in 2021, USDC became widely used for decentralized financial applications and crypto trading settlement, fueling an explosion of its market capitalization from under $1B in 2020 to over $60B in 2025. The SEC‚Äôs Division of Corporation Finance engaged in an extensive almost year-long correspondence with Circle, raising concerns about whether USDC should be considered a security and if Circle qualifies as an ‚Äúinvestment company,‚Äù which would subject it to additional regulatory requirements. While Circle has so far faced challenges on the path to becoming publicly listed, the company believes that fulfilling that goal will enhance its transparency, trust, and compliance, which aligns with its long-term strategy to solidify its position in the financial industry. Allaire often emphasizes the importance of this goal to the company. ‚ÄúWe believe becoming a U.S.-listed, publicly traded company is critical to our future,‚Äù he said. The Trump administration has so far delivered on its promise to progress crypto regulation, and legislative efforts, such as the GENIUS Act and the STABLE Act could provide comprehensive federal and state-level regulation for stablecoin issuers like Circle. That regulatory clarity and stability could explain why the stablecoin issuer is confident with advancing its IPO plans this year. Cryptopolitan Academy: Tired of market swings? Learn how DeFi can help you build steady passive income. Register Now

title: Bitcoin Put Option Trade With $1M Premium Highlights Concern Over Declining BTC Price
body: A large bitcoin ( BTC ) options bet crossed the tape on Deribit as the first quarter drew to a close on Monday, revealing bearish sentiment from the trader behind the move. The so-called block trade carried a premium of more than $1 million for 1,180 contracts of the $70,000 put option expiring April 25, according to data tracked by Amberdata . A put option gives the purchaser the right, but not the obligation, to sell the underlying asset at a predetermined price at a later date. A put buyer is essentially bearish on the market, in this case, anticipating a price drop to below $70,000 from the current $84,000. A block trade is a large, privately negotiated transaction executed outside the public market,¬†typically by institutions, to avoid affecting the going market rate. Other notable trades included a put ratio spread, featuring long positions in the $75,000 strike put and double short positions in the $70,000 put; and a risk reversal, involving a long position in the $90,000 call and a short position in the $70,000 put, as Pelion Capital founder Tony Stewart noted. The bearish flow in the $70,000 put follows purchases of put options expiring April 4 in the $78,000 to $85,000 range last week and increased demand for the $76,000 put option expiring on April 25. Broadly speaking, BTC puts are trading at a premium to calls, exhibiting downside sentiment out to the May-end expiry, as evident from the negative values in risk reversals. The bias for puts offering downside protection likely reflects investor anxiety surrounding President Donald Trump's expected reciprocal tariffs announcement on Wednesday. An aggressive move could weigh on risk assets, including cryptocurrencies.

title: A casual game themed around cryptocurrency, ‚ÄúRoad to Bitcoin,‚Äù is now live!
body: Tokyo, Japan ‚Äì April 1, 2025 ‚Äì Coinscribble by Coinbound / gumi Inc. (Headquarters: Shinjuku, Tokyo; President and CEO: Hiroyuki Kawamoto; hereinafter ‚Äúgumi‚Äù) is pleased to announce that its consolidated subsidiary, gC Games Inc. (Headquarters: Shinjuku, Tokyo; CEO: Yasushi Teramura; hereinafter ‚ÄúgC Games‚Äù), has officially launched ‚ÄúRoad to Bitcoin‚Äù , a cryptocurrency-themed casual mobile game. About ‚ÄúRoad to Bitcoin‚Äù ‚ÄúRoad to Bitcoin‚Äù was developed as part of gumi‚Äôs ‚ÄúOSHI3‚Äù project, which aims to establish a new token-based economy by integrating ‚Äúoshi-katsu‚Äù with Web3. The project, led by gumi, seeks to promote awareness of its native currency, the OSHI token , as well as various other cryptocurrencies. By playing the game, users can familiarize themselves with cryptocurrencies in a fun and engaging way. Download Now! Live on both App Store and Google Play: Download Here Game Overview ‚ÄúRoad to Bitcoin‚Äù is a puzzle game where players drop cryptocurrencies from above and merge identical ones to create larger assets. When two of the same cryptocurrencies collide, they evolve into a higher-tier asset. The final stage involves merging Bitcoin, which then disappears. The game ends when cryptocurrencies stack up to the top of the box. The goal is to merge as many as possible before this happens and achieve a high score. Additional Features: PvE Battle Mode featuring original in-game characters. Various skills and items to enhance gameplay. A five-stage challenge to complete. Both original and real-world cryptocurrencies appear in the game. Road to Bitcoin Launch Campaign To celebrate the launch, gumi is holding two special campaigns. For campaign details, please visit the official campaign page . 1. ‚ÄúSINGLE‚Äù Mode Score Post Campaign Players who play the ‚ÄúSINGLE‚Äù mode and post their score screen on X will be entered into a lottery. 1,000 winners will receive a share of 1,000,000 yen worth of OSHI tokens. 2. ‚ÄúDUEL‚Äù Mode Completion Campaign Players who complete the ‚ÄúDUEL‚Äù mode will have a chance to win 300,000 yen worth of USDC, distributed among 60 winners. The faster the completion time, the higher the chance of winning. title: XRP, DOGE Shoot up as BTC Price Reclaims $84K Level (Market Watch)
body: Bitcoin‚Äôs nosedive was finally halted as the asset bounced off the $81,000 support and has added three grand since then. The altcoins have reacted well to the recent crash, too, with most charting impressive gains over the past day. ETH, XRP, DOGE, and ADA lead the pack from the larger caps. BTC Rises Above $84K The previous business week started on the right foot for BTC as the asset broke out of its weekend consolidation levels of around $84,000 and jumped to a 17-day peak of almost $89,000. Although it was stopped there, it managed to remain close to that line for the next few days. However, the landscape started to change for the worse as the week progressed. The culmination was on Friday when BTC fell from $87,500 to $83,500 within hours. Its recovery attempt was short-lived, and the bears kept the pressure on, pushing the asset south to $81,600 on Saturday. After another unsuccessful bounce-off attempt during the weekend, bitcoin plunged to $81,200 on a couple of occasions on Sunday evening and on Monday. This support was able to hold, and BTC finally started to recover. In the past 24 hours, the asset gained more than three grand and now sits above $84,000. Its market cap has risen to $1.670 trillion on CG, while its dominance over the alts is still north of 59%. BTCUSD. Source: TradingView Alts Recover Most altcoins have turned green today. ETH leads the pack with a 5% surge that has pushed its price to almost $1,900. XRP has increased by a similar percentage (5.5%) and is close to $2.2. Other notable gainers from the larger-cap alts include DOGE, ADA, TON, LINK, SUI, SHIB, AVAX, and XLM. The most impressive price pumps come from EOS (14%), Sonic (13%), Render (11%), Aave (10%), BONK (10%), and PEPE (10%). The total crypto market cap has added over $70 billion in a day and has risen to $2.830 trillion on CG. Cryptocurrency Market Overview. Source: QuantifyCrypto The post XRP, DOGE Shoot up as BTC Price Reclaims $84K Level (Market Watch) appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: Unlock Onchain Privacy: 0xbow‚Äôs Revolutionary Privacy Pools Solution
body: In the ever-evolving world of cryptocurrency, where transparency is often touted as a core tenet, the need for privacy remains paramount for many users. Enter 0xbow, a privacy-focused infrastructure provider, making waves with its latest offering: Privacy Pools. Inspired by groundbreaking research co-authored by Ethereum‚Äôs visionary co-founder, Vitalik Buterin, Privacy Pools are poised to redefine how we think about onchain privacy . Are you ready to take control of your digital footprint in the crypto space? What are Privacy Pools and Why Should You Care About Onchain Privacy? Imagine a world where you can transact on the blockchain without revealing your entire financial history to prying eyes. This is the promise of onchain privacy , and it‚Äôs becoming increasingly crucial as blockchain technology matures. While blockchains offer unprecedented transparency, this transparency can also be a double-edged sword. Every transaction is recorded and publicly accessible, potentially exposing sensitive personal and financial information. This is where Privacy Pools step in as a game-changer. Privacy Pools are designed as a cutting-edge solution to enhance confidentiality in cryptocurrency transactions. They are not about enabling illicit activities; instead, they are about empowering individuals to maintain their financial privacy within the bounds of the law. Think of it as using encrypted communication channels in a world where everyone else is shouting their conversations in public. Zero-Knowledge Proofs: The Secret Sauce Behind Privacy Pools The magic behind Privacy Pools lies in the ingenious application of zero-knowledge proofs. But what exactly are these cryptographic marvels? In simple terms, zero-knowledge proofs allow you to prove something is true without revealing any information about the ‚Äòsomething‚Äô itself. It‚Äôs like convincing someone you know a secret password without actually telling them the password. Applied to Privacy Pools, this technology enables users to anonymously transfer ERC-20 tokens. Here‚Äôs a breakdown: Anonymity: Transactions are conducted without revealing the sender or receiver‚Äôs identities. Verification: The system can verify that transactions are legitimate and comply with rules without needing to see the transaction details. Prevention of Illicit Funds: A crucial aspect is the design to prevent the inflow of illicit funds into these pools, differentiating them from traditional mixing services often associated with money laundering. This innovative approach ensures that while privacy is enhanced, the integrity of the blockchain and the legitimacy of transactions are maintained. It‚Äôs a delicate balance, expertly engineered by 0xbow. ERC-20 Tokens and the Versatility of Privacy Pools Privacy Pools are initially designed to work with ERC-20 tokens , the workhorse token standard of the Ethereum network. Why is this significant? ERC-20 tokens are ubiquitous in the crypto ecosystem, representing a vast array of digital assets, from stablecoins to utility tokens and beyond. By focusing on ERC-20 compatibility, Privacy Pools immediately become relevant and usable for a large segment of the cryptocurrency market. This means users can now explore enhanced privacy for a wide range of their crypto holdings. Here‚Äôs a glimpse into the potential applications: Use Case Benefit for User Private DeFi Transactions Engage in decentralized finance activities without exposing your trading strategies or portfolio holdings. Anonymous Payments Make payments for goods and services with greater privacy, shielding your financial transactions from unnecessary scrutiny. Enhanced Security Reduce the risk of targeted attacks by obscuring your on-chain financial footprint. Addressing the Challenges of Blockchain Privacy Creating truly private transactions on a public blockchain is no easy feat. Blockchain privacy faces several inherent challenges: Transparency by Design: Blockchains are inherently designed to be transparent and auditable. Overcoming this fundamental characteristic requires sophisticated cryptographic solutions. Regulatory Scrutiny: Privacy solutions in crypto often face regulatory concerns due to fears of misuse for illegal activities. Balancing privacy with regulatory compliance is a critical challenge. User Experience: Privacy tools need to be user-friendly to ensure widespread adoption. Complex cryptographic processes must be abstracted away for the average user. Privacy Pools, with their foundation in academic research and focus on preventing illicit fund flows, aim to address these challenges head-on. By using zero-knowledge proofs and designing with regulatory considerations in mind, 0xbow is striving to create a privacy solution that is both powerful and responsible. Vitalik Buterin‚Äôs Influence: A Stamp of Approval for Privacy Pools The fact that Privacy Pools are inspired by a research paper co-authored by Vitalik Buterin , a towering figure in the crypto world, lends significant credibility to the project. Buterin‚Äôs involvement signals that this approach to privacy is not only innovative but also aligned with the broader vision for Ethereum and the future of blockchain technology. His research likely provided the theoretical underpinning and validation for the cryptographic techniques employed in Privacy Pools. This connection to Buterin‚Äôs work can be seen as a strong endorsement of the project‚Äôs potential and its adherence to sound principles of blockchain design. Actionable Insights: How to Prepare for the Privacy-Focused Future As privacy pools and similar technologies mature, what can you do to stay ahead of the curve and prepare for a more privacy-centric crypto future? Stay Informed: Keep up-to-date with developments in blockchain privacy technologies, including Privacy Pools and other emerging solutions. Educate Yourself on Zero-Knowledge Proofs: Understanding the basics of zero-knowledge proofs will help you appreciate the technical underpinnings of these privacy tools. Explore Privacy-Enhancing Tools: As Privacy Pools and similar solutions become more readily available, consider experimenting with them to understand their benefits and limitations. Advocate for Responsible Privacy: Support initiatives that promote privacy in crypto while also addressing legitimate regulatory concerns and preventing misuse. Conclusion: Embracing a New Era of Onchain Privacy 0xbow‚Äôs Privacy Pools represent a significant step forward in the quest for blockchain privacy . By leveraging the power of zero-knowledge proofs and drawing inspiration from the research of thought leaders like Vitalik Buterin, they are paving the way for a future where users can enjoy the benefits of cryptocurrency transactions with greater confidentiality and control over their personal information. As the crypto landscape continues to evolve, solutions like Privacy Pools will be crucial in shaping a more balanced and user-centric ecosystem. The era of truly private onchain transactions is dawning ‚Äì are you ready to embrace it? To learn more about the latest blockchain privacy trends, explore our article on key developments shaping blockchain privacy solutions.

title: Revolutionary OpenAI Funding: Secures Massive $40B at $300B Valuation ‚Äì A Game Changer for AI?
body: Hold onto your hats, crypto enthusiasts and tech aficionados! The world of Artificial Intelligence (AI) has just witnessed a seismic event that‚Äôs sending shockwaves through the industry ‚Äì and it‚Äôs something you absolutely need to understand. OpenAI, the powerhouse behind ChatGPT and DALL-E, has just announced a colossal **OpenAI Funding** round, securing a mind-blowing $40 billion! Yes, you read that right ‚Äì $40 billion! This isn‚Äôt just pocket change; it‚Äôs a **massive investment** that catapults OpenAI‚Äôs post-money **AI Valuation** to an astounding $300 billion. In the fast-paced world of tech and crypto, where innovation is the lifeblood, this kind of funding round is not just news; it‚Äôs a landmark moment. Let‚Äôs dive deep into what this means, why it matters, and how it could potentially ripple through the cryptocurrency and broader tech landscapes. Unpacking the Mammoth OpenAI Funding Round So, what exactly happened? On a recent Monday, OpenAI officially declared the closure of one of the most significant private funding rounds in history. According to their official blog post, this **OpenAI Funding** injection of $40 billion comes with a post-money valuation of $300 billion. Leading this monumental round is none other than SoftBank, a name synonymous with transformative tech investments. Joining SoftBank in this venture are tech giants and investment heavyweights like Microsoft, Coatue, Altimeter, and Thrive Capital. This isn‚Äôt just about the money; it‚Äôs about the collective belief from some of the world‚Äôs biggest players in OpenAI‚Äôs vision and potential. OpenAI itself stated that this influx of capital will be instrumental in several key areas: Pushing the Frontiers of AI Research: Expect even more groundbreaking advancements in AI as OpenAI ramps up its research efforts. Scaling Compute Infrastructure: To power increasingly sophisticated AI models and handle the ever-growing user base, a robust compute infrastructure is crucial. This funding will significantly bolster that. Delivering More Powerful Tools: For the 500 million weekly ChatGPT users and beyond, this means more powerful, versatile, and innovative AI tools are on the horizon. The partnership with SoftBank is particularly noteworthy. OpenAI explicitly mentioned their excitement about working with SoftBank, recognizing their expertise in scaling transformative technologies. This collaboration signals a strategic move towards not just developing cutting-edge AI but also effectively deploying and scaling it globally. Why is This $300 Billion AI Valuation So Significant? Let‚Äôs put this **AI Valuation** into perspective. A $300 billion valuation places OpenAI among the most valuable private companies globally, rivaling tech titans like SpaceX and ByteDance. But it‚Äôs not just about the numbers; it‚Äôs about what this valuation represents. It‚Äôs a powerful indicator of: Market Confidence in AI: This valuation underscores the immense confidence investors have in the future of Artificial Intelligence and its transformative potential across industries. OpenAI‚Äôs Leadership Position: It solidifies OpenAI‚Äôs position as a leader in the AI race, particularly in generative AI, where models like ChatGPT have captured global attention. Future Growth Potential: A $300 billion valuation isn‚Äôt just about current achievements; it‚Äôs a bet on massive future growth and market dominance in the rapidly expanding AI landscape. Consider this in the context of the cryptocurrency world. Just as blockchain technology and cryptocurrencies are seen as disruptive forces reshaping finance, AI is increasingly viewed as the next wave of technological revolution, poised to transform everything from software development to healthcare, and even the very fabric of how we interact with technology. ChatGPT Growth and the User Explosion: Fueling the Funding Fire One of the key drivers behind this staggering **OpenAI Funding** and valuation is undoubtedly the phenomenal **ChatGPT Growth**. OpenAI highlighted that 500 million people use ChatGPT every week. Let that sink in. Half a billion users weekly! This explosive growth isn‚Äôt just about user numbers; it‚Äôs about demonstrating real-world adoption and utility of AI on a massive scale. Here‚Äôs a closer look at the factors contributing to ChatGPT‚Äôs meteoric rise: User-Friendly Interface: ChatGPT‚Äôs conversational interface makes AI accessible to everyone, not just tech experts. Versatile Applications: From content creation and coding assistance to customer service and education, ChatGPT‚Äôs applications are incredibly diverse. Continuous Improvement: OpenAI is constantly refining and improving ChatGPT, making it more powerful, accurate, and versatile over time. Network Effects: As more people use ChatGPT, it generates more data, leading to further improvements and attracting even more users ‚Äì a powerful network effect in action. This massive user base and the demonstrated utility of ChatGPT are compelling evidence for investors. It showcases that OpenAI isn‚Äôt just building futuristic tech in a lab; they are creating tools that people are actively using and finding value in, right now. SoftBank Investment: A Strategic Alliance for Global Scale The leadership of SoftBank in this **OpenAI Funding** round is a significant detail. **SoftBank Investment** is renowned for identifying and scaling disruptive technologies. Their portfolio includes companies like Alibaba, Arm, and Uber, demonstrating a keen eye for businesses with the potential to reshape industries. SoftBank‚Äôs involvement signals more than just financial backing; it suggests a strategic partnership aimed at global expansion and market dominance for OpenAI. What does SoftBank bring to the table besides capital? Global Network and Reach: SoftBank‚Äôs extensive global network can help OpenAI expand its reach into new markets and forge strategic partnerships worldwide. Scaling Expertise: SoftBank has a proven track record of scaling tech companies rapidly and efficiently. This expertise will be invaluable as OpenAI aims to meet the growing demand for its AI solutions. Long-Term Vision: SoftBank typically takes a long-term investment approach, aligning with OpenAI‚Äôs ambitious vision for the future of AI. The partnership with SoftBank is a strong indicator that OpenAI is not just aiming for incremental growth; they are setting their sights on becoming a dominant force in the global AI landscape. This strategic alliance could be a game-changer in how AI technology is developed, deployed, and integrated into various aspects of our lives. Artificial Intelligence: Beyond the Hype, Into Reality The term **Artificial Intelligence** has been buzzing for years, often accompanied by hype and futuristic visions. However, with the rise of models like ChatGPT and the massive **OpenAI Funding** rounds, AI is moving beyond the hype and firmly into reality. We are witnessing a tangible shift where AI is no longer just a theoretical concept but a practical tool with real-world applications and significant economic impact. Here‚Äôs how AI is transitioning from hype to reality: Practical Applications: AI is being deployed in a wide range of industries, from customer service and marketing to healthcare and finance, solving real-world problems and creating new opportunities. Increased Accessibility: Tools like ChatGPT are making AI more accessible to businesses and individuals, democratizing its use and fostering innovation across sectors. Measurable ROI: Companies are increasingly seeing a tangible return on investment from AI adoption, driving further investment and growth in the field. Ethical Considerations: As AI becomes more pervasive, serious discussions and frameworks are emerging around ethical AI development and deployment, ensuring responsible innovation. This $40 billion funding round for OpenAI is a powerful signal that AI is not just a fleeting trend but a fundamental technological shift that is here to stay and will continue to reshape our world in profound ways. For those in the cryptocurrency space, understanding the trajectory of AI is crucial, as these technologies are increasingly intertwined and will likely influence each other‚Äôs future development. The Broader Implications: AI, Crypto, and the Future What does all of this mean for the cryptocurrency and broader tech landscape? The massive **OpenAI Funding** and **AI Valuation** have several significant implications: Increased Investment in AI: This funding round is likely to spur even more investment in the AI sector, attracting venture capital and corporate investments into AI startups and research initiatives. AI-Crypto Convergence: We may see increased convergence between AI and blockchain technologies. AI could enhance blockchain security, scalability, and efficiency, while blockchain could provide transparency and decentralization to AI systems. New Business Models: The growth of AI will likely lead to the emergence of new business models and industries that we can‚Äôt even fully imagine yet. Just as crypto gave rise to DeFi and NFTs, AI could unlock entirely new categories of digital assets and services. Ethical and Regulatory Scrutiny: As AI becomes more powerful and pervasive, expect increased ethical and regulatory scrutiny. This will be crucial to ensure responsible AI development and prevent misuse. For cryptocurrency enthusiasts and investors, keeping a close eye on the AI sector is becoming increasingly important. The technologies are not isolated; they are part of a larger technological revolution. Understanding the trends in AI, its funding landscape, and its potential applications can provide valuable insights into future investment opportunities and technological shifts that will shape the coming decades. Conclusion: The AI Revolution is Here and It‚Äôs Massive OpenAI‚Äôs $40 billion funding round at a $300 billion valuation is not just a financial milestone; it‚Äôs a **revolutionary** moment for the AI industry. It underscores the immense potential of **Artificial Intelligence**, the phenomenal **ChatGPT Growth**, and the strategic importance of **SoftBank Investment**. This **massive investment** is set to fuel further innovation, accelerate the development of even more powerful AI tools, and solidify OpenAI‚Äôs leadership in the global AI race. As AI continues to move from hype to reality, its impact on industries, economies, and even our daily lives will only become more profound. For those in the cryptocurrency and tech worlds, this is a clear signal: the AI revolution is not coming ‚Äì it‚Äôs already here, and it‚Äôs massive. To learn more about the latest AI market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping AI features.

title: Backpack launches fund claim process for EU customers following acquisition of FTX‚Äôs EU arm
body: Backpack, a crypto exchange founded by former FTX executives, has initiated the fund claim process for FTX‚Äôs EU customers as part of the ongoing global efforts to distribute FTX bankruptcy recovery funds. On April 1, Backpack announced the launch of a two-step process for customers to claim their euro funds. Step 1, identity verification, is now live, while Step 2, the withdrawal of funds, will be announced soon. Former FTX EU customers may now begin the two-step process to claim their Euro funds via Backpack EU. Step 1, identity verification, is live. Get Verified: https://t.co/qvUDpbsEdQ pic.twitter.com/ECcHFumG18 ‚Äî Backpack üéí (@Backpack) April 1, 2025 FTX‚Äôs Chapter 11 bankruptcy reorganization plan was approved by a U.S. bankruptcy judge in October 2024, paving the way for the distribution of funds to creditors. This approval set the stage for the commencement of repayment efforts, with Kraken and BitGo handling the global distributions. While Kraken and BitGo were selected as the official partners to assist with the technical aspects of repaying creditors during the bankruptcy proceedings, Backpack‚Äôs role in the repayment process of FTX‚Äôs EU customers‚Äô funds is part of the acquisition deal. Backpack has just acquired the former European arm of the FTX exchange, which was approved by the FTX bankruptcy court and the Cyprus Securities and Exchange Commission in December last year. This allowed Backpack to reinstate FTX EU‚Äôs licenses and offer a full suite of crypto derivatives trading services to EU customers. You might also like: Crypto exchange Backpack, founded by former FTX execs, acquires FTX EU FTX crypto exchange, which filed for bankruptcy in November 2022, commenced its $13 billion repayment process on Feb. 18, focusing initially on ‚Äúconvenience class‚Äù creditors‚Äîthose with claims up to $50,000, with repayments facilitated by BitGo and Kraken. These creditors are slated to receive full compensation for their adjudicated claim value plus an annual interest rate of 9% dating back to November 2022, by April 11. Earlier this month, FTX creditor representative Sunil confirmed that the second round of payout distribution, covering claims both and above $50,000, will take place on May 30. You might also like: FTX to begin next round of payouts May 30

title: Japanese Metaplanet adds 696 BTC through Q1 options strategy
body: Metaplanet acquired 696 Bitcoin in Q1 by executing a put options strategy, securing an effective purchase price of 13.48 million yen per BTC. Tokyo-based¬†Metaplanet Inc. acquired 696 Bitcoin ( BTC ) in the first quarter of 2025 through its Bitcoin Income Generation business, a program focused on selling cash-secured Bitcoin put options, the firm said in a regulatory filing on April 1. In the document , the firm stated that it earned 770.35 million yen (around $5.15 million) in operating revenue from the strategy, which it described as a way to ‚Äúgenerate recurring revenue while increasing long-term Bitcoin holdings.‚Äù According to the report, Metaplanet deployed 9.386 billion yen in cash collateral, receiving over 50.26 BTC in option premiums, while an additional 645.74 BTC the firm acquired when some options were exercised. You might also like: Bitcoin-focused Metaplanet‚Äôs total holdings break through 3k BTC Metaplanet said its Bitcoin Income Generation business aims to monetize Bitcoin volatility while supporting its capital plans and operates separately from its long-term Bitcoin holdings. With its Q1 results, the company shared that it has reached 25.7% of its 3 billion yen full-year revenue goal for this business, adding that any future capital deployment would be decided at the discretion of management. Metaplanet bought the Bitcoin shortly after raising 2 billion yen through its 10th Series of Ordinary Bonds, which was fully allocated to EVO FUND for more Bitcoin purchases. Since it began accumulating Bitcoin, its stock has surged over 3,000%, suggesting strong market interest. As crypto.news reported earlier, the firm aims to hold 21,000 BTC by 2026. Read more: Japan‚Äôs Metaplanet taps Eric Trump for Bitcoin-focused advisory board

title: Three reasons why EOS rallied over 20% today
body: EOS rallied as high as 23% today, ahead of its major rebranding to Vaulta, as multiple bullish patterns emerged on its charts. EOS ( EOS ) price shot up for the third day in a row, hitting an intraday high of $0.707 on April 1 as its market cap climbed to over $1 billion when writing. The price surge was accompanied by an 87% increase in trading volume, with $371.6 million exchanged between traders. There are three main catalysts driving EOS crypto‚Äôs gains today. First off, there‚Äôs a lot of hype around EOS‚Äôs upcoming rebranding to Vaulta , expected to go live by the end of May 2025. The project is shifting its focus toward blockchain-powered banking solutions. As part of the rebrand, the EOS token will transition into Vaulta, with a fresh ticker expected to be revealed later this month. The new token will carry over all of EOS‚Äôs core tech, including its integration with exSat, the Bitcoin banking solutions. Second, the new Vaulta token will offer a staking yield of around 17% , backed by a reward pool of about 250 million tokens, placing it much higher than major players like Ethereum ( ETH ) and Solana ( SOL ) at 2.03% and 5.14%, respectively. You might also like: REZ crypto soars over 35% ahead of Bithumb listing Lastly, traders in the derivatives market are clearly betting on EOS going higher. Da ta from CoinGlass shows that open interest in EOS futures surged more than 30%, hitting an 11-month high of $144.14 million. The funding rate has also flipped positive, a sign that more traders are now betting on the upside in the near term. Chart watchers are taking notice, as they believe the rally could just be getting started. Analyst CW pointed out that EOS has already cleared a key sell wall at $0.65 and now has its sights set on the $1 mark, a major psychological and technical level that the altcoin hasn‚Äôt reached since mid-December last year. Fellow analyst World of Charts echoed the same price target, noting that EOS still has plenty of momentum for a potential continuation of the ongoing rally. EOS technical analysis From a technical standpoint, things are lining up well for the bulls. On the 1-day/USDT price chart, EOS price recently broke out of a descending wedge pattern that had been holding it down for months. In technical analysis, the pattern is seen as a bullish reversal signal, especially after a long downtrend. EOS price, Supertrend and Aroon indicator ‚Äî April 1 | Source: crypto.news The move happened around the $0.45‚Äì$0.50 zone, which had acted as strong support in the past. Now, EOS is trading above $0.67 and looks to be heading toward the next key resistance near $1. The Supertrend indicator has flipped bullish, moving below the price and flashing green, a sign that the trend might be shifting in favor of the bulls. On top of that, the Aroon Up is at 100% while the Aroon Down is at 0%, showing that buying pressure is clearly dominating over any selling right now. EOS 50-day and 20-day SMA chart ‚Äî April 1 | Source: crypto.news Over on the 4-hour chart, EOS also formed a golden cross on March 25, with the 50-day moving average crossing above the 200-day SMA. The pattern hasn‚Äôt been invalidated yet and could set the stage for a longer-term move higher, with $1 as the next potential target. Read more: Analysis: Bitcoin may see consolidation in April and May as selling pressure drops Disclosure: This article does not represent investment advice. The content and materials featured on this page are for educational purposes only.

title: Best Presales to Buy During Current Market Instability
body: With Donald Trump‚Äôs new reciprocal tariffs set to take effect from tomorrow (April 2), the stage is set for an out-and-out trade war between the biggest economies of the world. Ahead of the tariff deadline ‚Äì also known as the ‚ÄòLiberation Day‚Äô ‚Äì Trump issued a stern warning that no country would be exempted from the proposed tariffs. Unsurprisingly, this has set off a market-wide sell-off, with stocks of prominent US companies closing in the red on Monday. In this article, we‚Äôll briefly touch upon the most important reasons for the current sideways/downwards sloping market, why buying the best presales is a cheat code in these conditions, and which ones should you actually consider investing in. Two Major Reasons for Current Market Uncertainty The world looked on in anticipation when Elon Musk joined Donald Trump in the latter‚Äôs historic presidential campaign. Fans of the duo were quick to call this a once-in-a-lifetime moment for crypto. Although $BTC and $ETH coughed up legendary rallies immediately after Trump‚Äôs victory, they were rather short-lived. Almost three months later and we‚Äôre now on the brink of a recession. This is primarily due to the larger macroeconomic conditions set in motion by Trump‚Äôs tariffs and Musk‚Äôs Department of Government Efficiency (D.O.G.E). Trump‚Äôs Tariffs Slated to take effect from April 2, Trump‚Äôs tariffs measure will impose reciprocal tax rates on the goods imported by the US. Although Trump believes this would reduce America‚Äôs dependence on foreign goods and boost domestic production, the immediate reality is very different. These tariffs will, in fact, make goods costlier for regular folks in the US and send ease of doing business for American companies for a toss. Nvidia, for instance, imports its AI servers from Mexico, which is going to face the brunt of a 35% import tax thanks to Trump. As a result, Nvidia‚Äôs stock has fallen 22% in 2025 . Musk‚Äôs D.O.G.E Elon Musk formed D.O.G.E to reduce unnecessary federal spending. For example, the organization wants to save nearly $1T in federal expenses in 2025 alone. How does it plan to achieve this? Job cuts. And that‚Äôs a problem. The way Musk has gone about executing D.O.G.E‚Äôs mission has been preposterous, to say the least. Erratic and bulk layoffs at a federal level have led to a massive surge in job applications. And with the current market being not-so-ideal for job seekers, D.O.G.E‚Äôs extreme steps are adding fuel to the recession fire. In fact, Warren Buffett‚Äôs Berkshire Hathaway warned a while back that firing so many people and reducing the state‚Äôs budget by so much can trigger a recession on its own . Given the market scenario, it could be worthwhile checking out the best new meme coins on presale . These are projects that are yet to be listed on exchanges, which is why they‚Äôre immune to the current market instability. 1. It is, in fact, the ONLY crypto on the market right now that‚Äôs offering real (and completely free) $BTC to token holders. $BTCBULL owners who buy and hold their tokens in Best Wallet ‚Äì a non-custodial and easy-to-use crypto wallet ‚Äì will automatically receive their $BTC share every time the King Crypto reaches a new milestone. This includes important round figures such as $150K, $200K, and $250K. It‚Äôs also worth noting that the $BTCBULL team plans to keep the token‚Äôs market hype alive through regular token burn events. Furthermore, they‚Äôve also reserved a huge chunk (40%) of the total supply for PR and marketing purposes. After raising a whopping $1M within just a day after its launch, the BTC Bull Token presale now boasts over $4.3M in presale funding. One token is currently available for just $0.00244 ‚Äì here‚Äôs how to buy it . 2. Solaxy ($SOLX) ‚Äì First-Ever L2 Protocol on Solana Solana‚Äôs inability to break the $260 level despite the token being included in Trump‚Äôs proposed US Crypto Reserve speaks volumes about its underlying problems. Essentially, the blockchain that was once the undisputed hub for meme coins is now riddled with network congestion, limited scalability, and tailed transactions. Enter Solaxy ($SOLX) . It‚Äôs a new cryptocurrency planning to build the first-ever Layer 2 solution on Solana. By processing transactions off-chain and by leveraging Ethereum‚Äôs liquidity, $SOLX will reduce Solana‚Äôs workload and make it faster and more efficient than ever. Additionally, Solaxy‚Äôs whitepaper suggests that it will also process transactions in bulk. This will further jack up Solana‚Äôs affordability ‚Äì something it‚Äôs already renowned for. Luckily for you, this revolutionary meme coin is currently in presale ($28.7M+ raised), meaning you can get it for an extremely low price. Check out Solaxy‚Äôs price prediction for a detailed insight into its future prices. 1 $SOLX is currently priced at just $0.00168, and here‚Äôs a step-by-step guide on how to buy it . 3. Bitcoin Pepe ($BPEP) ‚Äì New Bitcoin-Themed Meme Coin Bitcoin Pepe ($BPEP) plans to build a Solana-like ecosystem for meme coins on the Bitcoin blockchain. This has never been done before, which is why this project is being touted as the ‚ÄòWorld‚Äôs ONLY Bitcoin Meme ICO.‚Äô It‚Äôs worth noting that BTC Bull Token, the #1 Bitcoin-themed meme coin right now, is actually based on Ethereum. Bitcoin Pepe, on the other hand, is based on the Bitcoin network. By combining Bitcoin‚Äôs class-leading liquidity and Solana‚Äôs speed and affordability, $BPEP will create a Layer-2 for meme coins on Bitcoin. Thanks to its unique mission, Bitcoin Pepe has already raised over $5.8M. It‚Äôs currently in presale, which is why each token is available for a low price of $0.0295. Conclusion Even though the above-mentioned altcoins are projected to list at a higher price than their current cost, after their listing, they‚Äôll have to work their way up in the same market ‚Äì which we can only hope reverses soon. Simply put, the crypto market guarantees no returns. This is why it‚Äôs important to only invest a small amount, irrespective of whether it‚Äôs in live tokens or presales. Also, kindly do thorough firsthand research before investing. None of the above is financial advice, after all.

title: Ripple just unlocked 500 million XRP
body: Ripple has just initiated its latest round of token unlocks from escrow, where the company is scheduled to release 1 billion tokens in April. As of April 1, the blockchain firm‚Äôs distribution strategy recorded the release of the first 500 million XRP , which has already been executed, according to on-chain data retrieved by Finbold from XRPScan. XRP escrow transactions. Source: XRPScan The month‚Äôs first tranche of XRP was moved from an escrow wallet to a Ripple-controlled wallet in a transaction executed at 00:00 UTC. The wallet in question has already scheduled 11 future escrow releases. Ripple‚Äôs escrow system was established to manage the controlled release of its XRP holdings. At the time, Ripple locked 55 billion XRP into escrow, with 1 billion XRP scheduled to be released monthly. These releases typically occur in phases throughout the month. After each unlock, Ripple often reallocates a portion of the XRP for operational purposes, such as supporting ecosystem development, partnerships, or market liquidity, while returning the remainder to escrow for future releases. For instance, on February 1, 2025, another 1 billion XRP unlock occurred from the Ripple (26) and Ripple (27) wallets. Of this amount, 400 million XRP and 100 million XRP were released from Ripple (26), while 500 million XRP came from Ripple (27). This release was valued at approximately $3.10 billion. On March 3, 2025, Ripple executed another 1 billion XRP unlock in three transactions. The remaining 500 million XRP from this month‚Äôs 1 billion unlock is expected to be released in the coming days or weeks, following Ripple‚Äôs typical phased approach. XRP price analysis Regarding XRP price movement, the unlocks can potentially introduce volatility for the token. However, at the moment, XRP does not seem to be significantly affected by the releases, as its price is moving in line with the broader cryptocurrency market . As of press time, XRP was trading at $2.16, gaining over 5% in the past 24 hours. Nevertheless the token remains 11% down on the weekly timeframe. XRP seven-day price chart. Source: Finbold Despite the short-term positive momentum, XRP is showing signs of weakness, as its current price sits below the 50-day simple moving average ( SMA ) of $2.38. The long-term trend remains positive, with the 200-day SMA at $1.76. Featured image via Shutterstock The post Ripple just unlocked 500 million XRP appeared first on Finbold .

title: Cryptocurrency Market Braces for Trump‚Äôs April 2 Tariff Policy Shockwave
body: Get ready for a potential market shake-up! All eyes are on former President Donald Trump as he gears up to unveil a new Trump tariff policy on April 2nd. The White House has confirmed the date, and whispers from CCTV News suggest senior officials have already presented proposals ‚Äì notably, without any exemptions. While Press Secretary Levitt is attempting to downplay concerns about the market impact tariffs might have, the cryptocurrency world is holding its breath. Could this be the next major catalyst for volatility, or a storm in a teacup? Let‚Äôs dive into what this April 2 tariff announcement could mean for the digital asset landscape. What‚Äôs the Buzz Around Trump‚Äôs April 2 Tariff Announcement? The anticipation surrounding Trump‚Äôs April 2 tariff announcement is palpable, especially given his track record of using tariffs as a key tool in international trade negotiations. Remember the trade wars of the past? Those events sent ripples across global markets, and this new policy could very well do the same. The fact that proposals are on the table without exemptions suggests a potentially broad and impactful approach. But what exactly could this mean for your crypto portfolio? [img src=‚Äùimage-placeholder.jpg‚Äù alt=‚ÄùTrump Tariff Policy and Cryptocurrency Market‚Äù] Decoding the Potential Market Impact Tariffs: What to Expect? Tariffs, at their core, are taxes on imported goods. While they are designed to protect domestic industries, they often lead to a cascade of economic effects. Here‚Äôs a breakdown of potential consequences and how they could intertwine with the cryptocurrency market: Increased Inflation: Tariffs can drive up the cost of imported goods, leading to higher prices for consumers. In an inflationary environment, assets like Bitcoin are often viewed as a hedge, potentially increasing demand and price. Trade Tensions and Economic Uncertainty: New tariffs could reignite global trade tensions, creating economic uncertainty. In times of uncertainty, investors may seek safe-haven assets, and some see cryptocurrencies as a modern alternative to traditional safe havens like gold. Supply Chain Disruptions: Tariffs can disrupt global supply chains, impacting businesses across various sectors. This disruption can lead to market volatility, which, historically, has sometimes benefited cryptocurrency markets as traders seek alternative investments. Currency Fluctuations: Tariff policies can influence currency exchange rates. Fluctuations in major currencies can indirectly affect the cryptocurrency market, as crypto is often traded against fiat currencies like the USD. Cryptocurrency Market Reaction: How Might Crypto Respond? The cryptocurrency market reaction to Trump‚Äôs tariff announcement is far from predictable, but we can look at historical patterns and market dynamics to make informed guesses: Scenario Potential Crypto Market Reaction Why? Tariffs perceived as highly disruptive and inflationary Potential price increase in Bitcoin and some altcoins Investors seek inflation hedges and alternative assets amid economic uncertainty. Tariffs seen as targeted and limited in scope Minimal direct impact, broader market sentiment may drive crypto movements If the impact is localized, the global crypto market might be less affected directly by tariffs alone. Risk-off sentiment dominates broader markets due to tariffs Potential short-term dip in crypto prices alongside traditional markets In a widespread risk-off environment, even crypto can experience temporary sell-offs as investors reduce overall risk exposure. Global Trade Tensions: A Recurring Theme? The prospect of new tariffs brings back the specter of global trade tensions . During previous periods of trade disputes, we witnessed increased market volatility across the board. For the cryptocurrency market, which thrives on volatility and narratives, this could present both challenges and opportunities. On one hand, heightened trade tensions can contribute to a risk-averse environment, potentially leading to short-term corrections in the crypto market. On the other hand, it reinforces the narrative of cryptocurrencies as decentralized, borderless assets that are less susceptible to geopolitical headwinds compared to traditional financial systems. Navigating the Tariff Terrain: Actionable Insights for Crypto Investors So, what should crypto investors do as we approach April 2nd? Here are some actionable insights: Stay Informed: Keep a close watch on news related to the Trump tariff policy announcement. Reputable financial news sources and crypto news platforms will be crucial. Manage Risk: Consider your portfolio risk levels. If you are risk-averse, you might want to reduce exposure or implement stop-loss orders to protect against potential downside volatility. Diversify: Diversification remains key. Don‚Äôt put all your eggs in one basket. A diversified crypto portfolio, and even diversification across asset classes, can help mitigate risk. Prepare for Volatility: Volatility is inherent in the crypto market, and tariff announcements can amplify it. Be prepared for potential price swings in either direction. Long-Term Perspective: Remember your long-term investment goals. Short-term market fluctuations driven by news events should ideally not derail your long-term strategy. Conclusion: Brace for Potential Waves in the Crypto Sea Trump‚Äôs April 2 tariff announcement is undoubtedly a significant event that could inject volatility into global markets, including the cryptocurrency sphere. While the exact cryptocurrency market reaction remains to be seen, understanding the potential market impact tariffs and the broader context of global trade tensions is crucial for navigating the coming weeks. Whether this tariff policy turns out to be a minor ripple or a major shockwave , being informed, prepared, and having a clear investment strategy will be your best assets in these potentially turbulent times. Keep your eyes peeled on April 2nd ‚Äì it could be a pivotal day for both traditional and digital finance. To learn more about the latest cryptocurrency market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action.

title: Bitcoin (BTC) has hit the Bottom: Is the Trend Reversal Starting Now?
body: There are signs that the Bitcoin bottom is in, following a local downward trend that has been active since 20 January this year. In that time the $BTC price lost as much as $32,000, equating to around 30% of its overall value. Is Bitcoin about to start clawing its way back to the all-time high? U.S. trade tariffs about to take effect Wednesday 2 April is dubbed ‚ÄúLiberation Day‚Äù by U.S. President Donald Trump. This is the day when the U.S. announces its plan for reciprocal tariffs on all countries that have standing tariffs imposed on U.S. goods, with an emphasis on countries with which the US has large trade imbalances. Not content with this, the U.S. will also impose a 25% tariff on all imported cars and auto parts that enter the country. This takes effect on 3 April. While there is still uncertainty as to how this will play out, not just for the U.S. domestic market, but also for global trade, at least the market will know the main extent of the U.S. strategy on tariffs by the end of this week, and then the market will have a better opportunity to price everything in. Has the S&P 500 dipped enough? The S&P 500 has lost as much as 10.6% from top to bottom during these last seven weeks since the talk of impending tariffs unsettled the market. This is the biggest dip since 10.8% in October 23, and is now more than the 9.7% reversal of the Japanese carry trade crash in August 2024. Could this current reversal continue on down as tariff reprisals start to come in from the likes of the European Union, Canada, and others? Yes, but the main thing is that these will shortly be known. The market will have the vast majority of its doubts clarified, and the current stock market dip may already have accounted for this. Gold tops as Bitcoin begins its rise With this crisis arguably about to subside, with liquidity entering the system from the likes of China, and a slackening of QT from the US, the stage could be about to be set for a resurgence from Bitcoin. With the gold price having reached $3,150, a top may be fast approaching, while the converse is true of Bitcoin, which has now perhaps found a bottom. Source: TradingView In the weekly chart above for BTC/GOLD, it can be seen that $BTC has now come down to the ascending trendline. This was a nearly 35% reversal against $GOLD, but should the bounce take place from here, it will be a very clear higher low, to add to the long sequence of higher highs and higher lows made since the beginning of the Bitcoin bull market which began in January 2023. The Stochastic RSI at the bottom of the chart is also very much in Bitcoin‚Äôs favour. $BTC trend change taking place? Source: TradingView The short-term chart for the price of $BTC (BTC/USDT) shows that the price is currently trying to battle with a horizontal resistance level before moving up to the descending trendline once again. With the last vestiges of U.S. stock market uncertainty still to play out during this week, it may be that there is some further choppiness to contend with. However, if the bulls can push the price up to, and beyond the descending trendline, a higher high at $88,800 will be the next target on the road to a trend change. Of course, there is still the strong support at $80,000 to come back down to should things turn uglier than expected over the tariff wars. Bitcoin 2-week chart Source: TradingView In the 2-week chart, which shows the entirety of this bull market, it can be seen that perhaps the price is ready to break through that descending trendline. Also, at the bottom of the chart, the Stochastic RSI may be making its lowest bottom of the bull market. With 12 days left in this period, this is a possibility. It just remains to be seen whether the price will jump straight back up, or whether it will chop sideways like it did during the 8-month bull flag. How the indicators in the Stochastic RSI rise from the bottom will have a say in the strength of the next upswing. Disclaimer: This article is provided for informational purposes only. It is not offered or intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice.

title: Is Binance Becoming Bitcoin‚Äôs Bank? STHs Trade Elsewhere, Data Suggests
body: Data: Bitcoin STHs deposit far less BTC to Binance than other exchanges lately Suggests lower sell pressure on Binance; may be viewed more for holding Binance BTC balance high (~570k), though net 30-day outflows hint at self-custody Bitcoin traders appear to treat Binance differently from other major crypto exchanges currently. This pattern signals a potential shift in market behavior and platform usage, according to recent analysis published by CryptoQuant . The on-chain analytics firm found that Short-Term Holders (STHs) ‚Äì defined generally as wallets holding Bitcoin for less than 155 days ‚Äì are sending significantly less BTC to Binance compared to other trading platforms. This trend could influence Bitcoin‚Äôs near-term price movement as investors possibly recalibrate their trading or holding strategies between exchanges. CryptoQuant‚Äôs data indicated STHs deposited only 6,300 BTC onto Binance over a tracked period. This represents a sharp drop compared to the average 24,700 BTC sent by STHs to other exchanges during the same timeframe. title: Why is Ethereum (ETH) price up today?
body: Ether ( ETH ) price rallied nearly 3% over the past 24 hours, reaching a high of $1,866 on April 1. The top altcoin‚Äôs daily trading volume increased by 27% to $15. billion as ETH climbed above $1,800. ETH/USD four-hour chart. Source: Cointelegraph/TradingView Several factors are behind Ethereum‚Äôs bullishness today, including: The launch of Privacy Pools on Ethereum. Reducing supply on exchanges. Ether‚Äôs market setup points to a 12% rebound next. Privacy Pools launch on Ethereum boosts ETH price One of the most significant drivers of Ether‚Äôs bullishness today is the launch of Privacy Pools on the Ethereum mainnet. gm Ethereum ‚òÄÔ∏è It is our great honor to announce the mainnet launch of Privacy Pools! ETH users can now achieve on-chain privacy, while still dissociating from illicit funds It is now up to all of us to Make Privacy Normal Again ü´° More info in this thread üëá pic.twitter.com/3nJO0AxoD1 ‚Äî 0xbow.io (@0xbowio) March 31, 2025 What to know: Announced by developers at 0xbow.io, Privacy Pools aims to enhance onchain privacy while addressing regulatory concerns‚Äîa balance that has long eluded many blockchain projects. Unlike previous privacy mixers like Tornado Cash, which faced sanctions for enabling illicit transactions, Privacy Pools use ‚ÄúAssociation Sets‚Äù to screen out bad actors while preserving user anonymity. The new privacy tool has garnered support from Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin himself. Buterin, a co-author of the original Privacy Pools research paper, made one of the first deposits, expressing his confidence in the project. Market participants responded to this with enthusiasm, with Cryptolive calling it a ‚Äúprivacy breakthrough,‚Äù with sentiment suggesting it could ‚Äúmake privacy normal again‚Äù in the blockchain industry. ‚ÄúThis is huge; it‚Äôs got the backing of Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin,‚Äù said DuckAI Agent, adding that it could be a sign of increased adoption and usage. ‚ÄúOverall, I'm bullish on ETH - this launch could be a game-changer for the ecosystem.‚Äù This development should increase Ethereum‚Äôs utility, potentially attracting more users and developers to the network, which in turn drives demand for ETH. Reducing ETH supply on exchanges Another factor supporting Ether‚Äôs performance today is reducing supply on exchanges. Key takeaways: ETH balance on exchanges has reached a 9-year low of 18.3 million ETH after dropping nearly 5% over the last 30 days. These are levels last seen in July 2016 when ETH was trading below $15. The amount of ETH supply on exchanges has resumed its downtrend, as shown in the chart below. ETH supply on exchanges. Source: CryptoQuant A decline in exchange supply suggests that holders are moving their ETH into cold storage or staking , reducing the circulating supply available for trading. Additionally, crypto whales are quietly accumulating ETH in anticipation of a significant upward move. ETH inflows into accumulation addresses have surged to multi-year highs, surpassing levels seen before major bull runs, as seen in the chart below. Ethereum accumulation addresses are a specific classification of wallet addresses used to track long-term holding behavior. ETH inflows into accumulation addresses. Source: CryptoQuant High inflows into accumulation addresses suggest that institutional investors and large holders are potentially taking advantage of ETH‚Äôs low price to accumulate. Related: zkLend hacker claims losing stolen ETH to Tornado Cash phishing site ETH price nurtures a V-shaped recovery Ether‚Äôs price action has been attempting a V-shaped recovery chart pattern on the four-hour chart since March 25, as shown below. A V-shaped recovery is a bullish pattern formed when an asset experiences a sharp price increase after a steep decline. It is completed when the price moves up to the resistance at the top of the V formation, also known as the neckline. ETH appears to be on a similar trajectory and now trades below a supply-demand zone between $1,900 and $2,000, where the 50-day, 100-day and 200-day simple moving averages (SMAs) sit. This suggests that bulls need to push the price above this area to increase the chances of reaching the neckline at $2,100 to complete the V-pattern. This would represent a 12% increase from the current price. ETH/USD daily chart. Source: Cointelegraph/ TradingView Meanwhile, the relative strength index, or RSI , has risen from oversold conditions at 21 on March 31 to 56 at the time of writing, suggesting that the bullish momentum is picking up. This article does not contain investment advice or recommendations. Every investment and trading move involves risk, and readers should conduct their own research when making a decision.

title: Bye Bye Europe: As Binance‚Äôs Official Stopped Its USDT Trading in the EEA Region
body: The post Bye Bye Europe: As Binance‚Äôs Official Stopped Its USDT Trading in the EEA Region appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Binance, one of the biggest cryptocurrency exchanges, has officially stopped spot trading pairs for USDT and eight other stablecoins in the European Economic Area (EEA). This move is part of its efforts to comply with the Markets in Crypto-Assets Regulation (MiCA), a new set of rules designed to regulate digital assets in the region. Binance Stopped USDT Trading in EEA On March 3rd, the exchange has officially informed users about the planned delisting, setting a deadline of March 31 for non-MiCA-compliant tokens. Despite the removal of these trading pairs, users in the EEA can still hold and trade the affected stablecoins through perpetual contracts. In addition to the delisting af USDT, biancne includes other stablecoins such as Dai (DAI), First Digital USD (FDUSD), TrueUSD (TUSD), Pax Dollar (USDP), Anchored Euro (AEUR), TerraUSD (UST), TerraClassicUSD (USTC), and PAX Gold. Perhaps, Binance had told its users to convert their holdings into MiCA-approved stablecoins like USDC or Eurite (EURI). Moreover, they have the Fiat trading options, such as the euro, remaining available as alternatives. Other Exchanges Follow Suit Following the Binance foot step Kraken has also delisted USDT and other stablecoins in the EEA, to comply with MiCA. The delisted stablecoins on Kraken‚Äôs exchange include PayPal USD (PYUSD), Tether EURt (EURT), and TrueUSD (TUSD). Meanwhile, Coinbase had already delisted USDT, anticipating MiCA‚Äôs impact, while a few other crypto exchange continues to trade the token as they wait for further regulatory updates. Impact On Crypto Market The removal of Tether‚Äôs flagship stablecoin, USDT, could affect market liquidity in Europe, making transactions slower and increasing costs for traders. Many investors are concerned about whether alternative stablecoins can provide the same level of reliability as USDT.

title: Japan to strongly advocate for exemption from U.S. auto tariffs
body: Japan‚Äôs Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba announced on Tuesday that Japan will continue to strongly push for the United States to exempt it from auto tariffs. He also vowed to take the necessary steps to mitigate the damage U.S. tariffs will cause to the economy and jobs. Japan expects a severe hit from the planned 25% tariff on automobile imports unveiled last week by U.S. President Donald Trump. On Wednesday, Trump also promised to announce that reciprocal tariffs would target every country. Japan pushes for exemption from U.S. auto tariffs Japan will keep up a strong push for the United States to exempt it from auto tariffs, Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba said on Tuesday, while vowing to take the necessary steps to cushion the blow to the economy and jobs. ‚Äî Ajay Bagga (@Ajay_Bagga) April 1, 2025 Japan‚Äôs Prime Minister revealed that the country was prepared to push for the United States to exclude it from auto tariffs. Ishiba also highlighted that Tokyo will take the necessary steps to prevent setbacks to the economy and jobs. President Donald Trump announced last week he will impose a 25% tariff on imports of automobiles and certain automobile parts, with processes to expand tariffs on additional parts if necessary. He noted that importers of automobiles under the United States-Mexico-Canada Agreement will have 25% tariffs applied only to the value of their non-U.S. content. Trump also promised to announce on April 2 reciprocal tariffs targeting every nation. The Prime Minister told a news conference that measures such as offers of funding support to cash-strapped firms were among those the government could consider to protect the economy from the higher tariffs. ‚ÄúThe government will negotiate with the ruling coalition at an early date specific measures we can take to respond.‚Äù ~ Shigeru Ishiba, Prime Minister of Japan. Ishiba acknowledged that government agencies were negotiating with U.S. counterparties to secure more details on Washington‚Äôs tariff plans. He also added that he ‚Äúwould not hesitate‚Äù to visit the United States again to voice a direct call for exemptions. Ishiba has also been grappling with sliding approval ratings ahead of an upper house election expected in July. The country‚Äôs PM has been under pressure to counter economic constraints from U.S. tariffs and shield households from rising costs of living. Japan‚Äôs inflation of 3.7% in February was among the highest in advanced economies, fueled by steady rises in food costs such as those of staple rice. Ishiba noted that the country‚Äôs big companies have offered bumper pay hikes in this year‚Äôs wage talks with unions, but it remains uncertain if smaller firms will follow suit, as Trump‚Äôs tariffs could threaten business expectations. The country‚Äôs senior official highlighted that the government would compile measures by May to push up Japan‚Äôs minimum wage. He also said a separate package by June will allow smaller companies to smoothly pass on rising costs. Ishiba noted that ‚Äúachieving wage hikes is at the core of our growth strategy.‚Äù He also stressed the need for pay hikes sufficient to compensate for the rising cost of living. Ishiba plans to mull what‚Äôs best for national interest Prime Minister Ishiba revealed on Thursday last week Japan will put ‚Äúall options on the table‚Äù in dealing with Washington‚Äôs announcement to impose a 25% tariff on automobile imports. He argued that Japan is a country that is making the largest amount of investment in the United States. Ishiba told parliament that ‚ÄúWe wonder if it makes sense for Washington to apply uniform tariffs to all countries.‚Äù The country‚Äôs official also said that Japan needs to consider what‚Äôs best for its national interest without elaborating on the possible steps Tokyo may take. The Ministry of Finance data revealed Japan‚Äôs automobile imports made up 28.3% of total exports to the United States in 2024, the biggest ratio among all items. The auto sector constitutes roughly 3% of Japan‚Äôs gross domestic product (GDP) and has been the driver of recent wage hikes. Executive economist at Nomura Research Institute (NRI) Takahide Kiuchi expects the 25% U.S. auto tariffs to push down Japan‚Äôs GDP by around 0.2%. Kiuchi maintained that the Trump tariff has the potential to immediately push Japan‚Äôs economy into deterioration. Luna Classic: The Comeback of Terra‚Äùs Original Cryptocurrency Luna Classic (LUNC) is the original token of the Terra blockchain, a platform that blends traditional currencies with the world of cryptocurrency. Terra uses stablecoins pegged to various currencies like the U.S. dollar, South Korean won, and even the Mongolian tugrik. This means it aims to keep prices steady, making global payments easier and more predictable. Launched officially in April 2019, Terra offers fast and affordable transactions. In May 2022, after a significant event, the original Terra chain was renamed Terra Classic, and its native token became Luna Classic (LUNC). LUNC has the potential to make a mark in the current crypto market. While many cryptocurrencies face ups and downs, LUNC‚Äùs connection to stablecoins could offer more stability. Stellar Lumens: Bridging Borders with Seamless Payments Stellar Lumens (XLM) is changing how money moves across the world. Since its launch in 2014, Stellar has processed billions of transactions, enabling quick and low-cost fund transfers without favoring any national currency. It‚Äùs a decentralized, open-source network that allows anyone to transfer funds globally, whether it‚Äùs digital representations of national currencies or cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin. Companies can build blockchain applications on Stellar or use the network for payments and currency conversion, making it a versatile tool in the financial landscape. In today‚Äùs market, Stellar stands out by aiming to enhance existing financial systems rather than replace them. HBAR: The Fast and Eco-Friendly Cryptocurrency Challenging the Norm Hedera Hashgraph is a new kind of decentralized network that‚Äùs different from traditional blockchains like Bitcoin and Ethereum. Instead of a blockchain, it uses something called hashgraph technology. This means it can handle more transactions at once, making it faster and more efficient. Since it doesn‚Äùt rely on mining, it‚Äùs better for the environment and has lower transaction costs. HBAR is the network‚Äùs currency, used to pay for transactions and keep the network secure through a Proof of Stake system. In a market crowded with cryptocurrencies, Hedera Hashgraph offers something unique. Its technology promises a more secure, speedy, and cost-effective way to handle transactions and smart contracts. As people look for greener and more efficient alternatives to existing cryptocurrencies, HBAR stands out as an attractive option. With its ambitious vision and innovative technology, Hedera Hashgraph could play a big role in the future of digital transactions. Launched in 2017 by the Tron Foundation, TRON started as a token on Ethereum but soon moved to its own network. The main idea behind TRON is simple: give full ownership to content creators. Fans can reward creators without any middlemen, making the process fair and transparent. TRON‚Äùs platform supports smart contracts and decentralized applications, known as dApps. This means developers can build their own tools and services without heavy fees. Transactions are recorded on a public ledger, so everything is open and trackable. In the current market, TRON stands out by focusing on decentralization and creator empowerment. While giants like Ethereum dominate the space, TRON offers a viable alternative with lower fees and a strong support for content sharing. With the growing interest in decentralized platforms, TRON presents an attractive option for both creators and consumers looking for more control and better rewards.
